WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #01 All events (All jurs)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #03 Confirmed positive (All jurs)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #03 Confirmed positive (All jurs) (SQL Output filter)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] JOIN [IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT] eo on c.[UNID] = eo.CASE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND eo.[VARIABLE] = 'COVID_19_LabResult' AND eo.[VALUE] = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #03 Confirmed positive (All jurs) (SQL Test Results with Output shown)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #03 Confirmed positive (All jurs) (SQL Test results)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #03b Confirmed positive (HHD) (SQL w/ Output filter)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] JOIN [IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT] eo on c.[UNID] = eo.CASE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE = 'WUHAN_NCOV' group by c.[UNID] HAVING 1=1 AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_LabResult' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'POSITIVE' AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'External_Geocoder_Jur' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'Houston'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #04 Confirmed negative (All jurs)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND inv.UNID IS NOT NULL AND c.[UNID] NOT IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE' ) group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #04 Confirmed negative (All jurs) (SQL Test Results)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND inv.UNID IS NOT NULL AND c.[UNID] NOT IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE' ) group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #05 PUM, PUI (All jurs)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND inv.UNID IS NULL group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #08 Confirmed positive (HHD)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE = 'Houston' group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #09 Confirmed negative (HHD)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE = 'Houston' AND inv.UNID IS NOT NULL AND c.[UNID] NOT IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE' ) group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #10 PUM, PUI (HHD)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE = 'Houston' AND inv.UNID IS NULL group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #11 All events (OOJ)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE <> 'Houston' AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NOT NULL group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #13 Confirmed positive (OOJ)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE <> 'Houston' AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NOT NULL group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #14 Confirmed negative (OOJ)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND inv.UNID IS NOT NULL AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE <> 'Houston' AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NOT NULL AND c.[UNID] NOT IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE' ) group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #15 PUM, PUI (OOJ)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE <> 'Houston' AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NOT NULL AND inv.UNID IS NULL group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #18 Confirmed positive (UNK)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NULL group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #19 Confirmed negative (UNK)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND inv.UNID IS NOT NULL AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NULL AND c.[UNID] NOT IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE' ) group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #20 PUM, PUI (UNK)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NULL AND inv.UNID IS NULL group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #20 PUM, PUI (UNK) (1)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('UNKNOWN') AND ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NULL AND inv.UNID IS NULL group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: #23 Confirmed positive (HHD+UNK)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID LEFT JOIN IDS_CONTACTPOINT ctpt on parp.PARTY_ID = ctpt.PARTY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND (ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE IS NULL OR ctpt.OFFICIAL_PLACE = 'Houston') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Active Outbreaks
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Active Outbreaks
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT unid FROM ids_case c WHERE c.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND c.type=10

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Active Outbreaks Area A
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Active Outbreaks in Area A
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT IDS_CASE.UNID FROM IDS_ANSWER RIGHT JOIN (IDS_QUESTIONSET RIGHT JOIN IDS_CASE ON IDS_QUESTIONSET.CASE_ID = IDS_CASE.UNID) ON IDS_ANSWER.QUESTIONSET_ID = IDS_QUESTIONSET.UNID WHERE (((IDS_CASE.TYPE)=10) AND ((IDS_QUESTIONSET.QUESTIONSET_ID)='OUTBREAK') AND ((IDS_ANSWER.QUESTION_ID)='HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA_A') AND ((IDS_ANSWER.VALUE)='A'));

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Active Outbreaks Area B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Active Outbreaks in Area B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT IDS_CASE.UNID FROM IDS_ANSWER RIGHT JOIN (IDS_QUESTIONSET RIGHT JOIN IDS_CASE ON IDS_QUESTIONSET.CASE_ID = IDS_CASE.UNID) ON IDS_ANSWER.QUESTIONSET_ID = IDS_QUESTIONSET.UNID WHERE (((IDS_CASE.TYPE)=10) AND ((IDS_QUESTIONSET.QUESTIONSET_ID)='OUTBREAK') AND ((IDS_ANSWER.QUESTION_ID)='HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA_B') AND ((IDS_ANSWER.VALUE)='B'));

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Active Outbreaks Area C
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Active Outbreaks in Area C
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT IDS_CASE.UNID FROM IDS_ANSWER RIGHT JOIN (IDS_QUESTIONSET RIGHT JOIN IDS_CASE ON IDS_QUESTIONSET.CASE_ID = IDS_CASE.UNID) ON IDS_ANSWER.QUESTIONSET_ID = IDS_QUESTIONSET.UNID WHERE (((IDS_CASE.TYPE)=10) AND ((IDS_QUESTIONSET.QUESTIONSET_ID)='OUTBREAK') AND ((IDS_ANSWER.QUESTION_ID)='HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA_C') AND ((IDS_ANSWER.VALUE)='C'));

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: All Foodborne ELRs: Open & Pending w/ Pos (+) Tests
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All Open, Pending, High Priority ELRs With Positive Test Results
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM ( SELECT ti1.*, trc.DESCRIPTION FROM ( SELECT c.[CASE_ID] AS Event_ID ,c.[UNID] ,c.CREATE_DATE AS CaseCreateDate ,parp.[PARTY_ID] AS PARTY_ID , pty.UNID AS PartyUNID ,pty.[EXTERNAL_ID] AS PARTY_EXTERNAL_ID ,pty.[FULL_NAME] AS FULL_NAME ,pty.[BIRTH_DATE] AS [BIRTH_DATE] ,p.[NAME] AS Condition ,p.[DESCRIPTION] AS ConditionDescription ,case when c.[STATUS] = 0 then 'Open' when c.[STATUS] = 3 then 'Manually Closed' when c.[STATUS] = 4 then 'Batch Closed' when c.[STATUS] = 6 then 'Invalid' end AS CaseStatus ,case when c.[TYPE] = 0 then 'Manual entry' when c.[TYPE] = 1 then 'Feed' end AS CaseType ,p.[PREFERRED_MODEL] AS Model ,'Investigation' AS TableType ,inv.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_UNID ,inv.[TYPE] AS INVESTIG_TYPE ,inv.[TEMPLATE] AS INVESTIG_TEMPLATE ,inv.[EXTERNAL_ID] AS INVESTIG_EXTERNAL_ID ,ir.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_RES_UNID ,CONVERT(nvarchar(30), ir.[RESULT_Date] , 101) AS QuestionResultDate ,ira.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_RES_ATTR_UNID ,ir.[RESULT_CODE] AS QuestionType ,ira.[NAME] AS Question ,ira.[VALUE] AS Value FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_USER] um ON c.[MODIFIED_BY_ID] = um.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_USER] uc ON c.[CREATED_BY_ID] = uc.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTY] pty ON parp.[PARTY_ID] = pty.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE p.CODE IN ( 'CAMP' ,'CPERF' ,'LIST' ,'NORO' ,'PFGE' ,'SAL' ,'SHIG' ,'STAPH' ,'TRICH' ) AND c.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2017' AND ira.[NAME] IN ('Result', 'ResultValue', 'Test') AND c.[STATUS] = 0 AND c.[TYPE] = 1 ) AS ti1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * ,CASE WHEN reference_group = 'HEALTH_FACILITY' THEN 'OrderingFacility' WHEN reference_group = 'LAB_FACILITY' THEN 'LabFacility' WHEN reference_group = 'LOINC' AND SUBGROUP <> 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SNOMED_LABTEST' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SPECIMEN_SOURCES' THEN 'SpecimenInfo' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY' THEN 'Susceptibility' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' THEN 'Susceptibility' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Susceptibility' END AS ReferenceQuestionType ,CASE WHEN reference_group = 'HEALTH_FACILITY' THEN 'Facility' WHEN reference_group = 'LAB_FACILITY' THEN 'Facility' WHEN reference_group = 'LOINC' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SNOMED_LABTEST' THEN 'Result' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SPECIMEN_SOURCES' THEN 'SpecimenSource' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY' THEN 'Result' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' THEN 'Method' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Test' END AS ReferenceQuestion FROM [IDS_REFERENCE_CODE] WHERE reference_group IN ( 'HEALTH_FACILITY' ,'LAB_FACILITY' ,'LOINC' ,'SNOMED' ,'SUSCEPTIBILITY' ,'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' ) ) AS trc ON ti1.Value = trc.REFERENCE_CODE AND ti1.Question = trc.ReferenceQuestion AND ti1.QuestionType = trc.ReferenceQuestionType ) AS t1t2 WHERE coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) IS NOT NULL AND CaseStatus NOT IN ('Batch Closed', 'Manually Closed') AND UNID IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_QUESTIONSET] qs ON c.[UNID] = qs.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_ANSWER] a ON qs.[UNID] = a.[QUESTIONSET_ID] WHERE p.CODE IN ( 'CAMP' ,'CPERF' ,'LIST' ,'NORO' ,'PFGE' ,'SAL' ,'SHIG' ,'STAPH' ,'TRICH' ) GROUP BY c.[UNID] HAVING ( MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[VALUE] else NULL End) = 'P' OR MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[VALUE] else NULL End) IS NULL ) AND MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] = 'MMWR_YEAR' then a.[VALUE] End) IN ('18') ) group by UNID ,INVESTIG_UNID HAVING MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Result' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE (case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'ResultValue' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) End) NOT IN ('No growth' ,'Non Reactive' ,'Not detected' ,'not isolated' ,'Negative' ,'Below threshold level (qualifier value)' ,'Analyte not detected' ,'Unsatisfactory' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: All High Priority ELRs: Open & Pending w/ Pos (+) Tests
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All Open, Pending, High Priority ELRs With Positive Test Results
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM ( SELECT ti1.*, trc.DESCRIPTION FROM ( SELECT c.[CASE_ID] AS Event_ID ,c.[UNID] ,c.CREATE_DATE AS CaseCreateDate ,parp.[PARTY_ID] AS PARTY_ID , pty.UNID AS PartyUNID ,pty.[EXTERNAL_ID] AS PARTY_EXTERNAL_ID ,pty.[FULL_NAME] AS FULL_NAME ,pty.[BIRTH_DATE] AS [BIRTH_DATE] ,p.[NAME] AS Condition ,p.[DESCRIPTION] AS ConditionDescription ,case when c.[STATUS] = 0 then 'Open' when c.[STATUS] = 3 then 'Manually Closed' when c.[STATUS] = 4 then 'Batch Closed' when c.[STATUS] = 6 then 'Invalid' end AS CaseStatus ,case when c.[TYPE] = 0 then 'Manual entry' when c.[TYPE] = 1 then 'Feed' end AS CaseType ,p.[PREFERRED_MODEL] AS Model ,'Investigation' AS TableType ,inv.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_UNID ,inv.[TYPE] AS INVESTIG_TYPE ,inv.[TEMPLATE] AS INVESTIG_TEMPLATE ,inv.[EXTERNAL_ID] AS INVESTIG_EXTERNAL_ID ,ir.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_RES_UNID ,CONVERT(nvarchar(30), ir.[RESULT_Date] , 101) AS QuestionResultDate ,ira.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_RES_ATTR_UNID ,ir.[RESULT_CODE] AS QuestionType ,ira.[NAME] AS Question ,ira.[VALUE] AS Value FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_USER] um ON c.[MODIFIED_BY_ID] = um.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_USER] uc ON c.[CREATED_BY_ID] = uc.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTY] pty ON parp.[PARTY_ID] = pty.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE p.CODE IN ( 'ANTH' ,'BOT' ,'BOTFDB' ,'BOTI' ,'BOTWND' ,'BRU' ,'BURK' ,'CAC' ,'CALI' ,'CHAGAS' ,'CHAGASCS' ,'CHAGASI' ,'CHIKV' ,'CHIKVNN' ,'CHOLERA' ,'CJD' ,'CRYPT' ,'CYCLO' ,'CYSTI' ,'DENGUE' ,'DHF' ,'DIP' ,'ECOLI' ,'FLUD' ,'FLUH1N1' ,'HANTA' ,'HEPA' ,'HEPB_A' ,'HEPB_PT' ,'HFLU' ,'HOOK' ,'HUS' ,'JAM' ,'JAP' ,'LAC' ,'LEG' ,'MAL' ,'MEAS' ,'MENB' ,'MENF' ,'MENP' ,'MERS' ,'MPOX' ,'MUMPS' ,'NMEN' ,'PERT' ,'PLAG' ,'POL' ,'POW' ,'QF' ,'QFACUTE' ,'QFCHRONIC' ,'RAB' ,'RUB' ,'RUBCONG' ,'SARS' ,'SMPOX' ,'TOXIN' ,'TUL' ,'TYPH' ,'TYPHCAR' ,'TYPHOID' ,'TYPHUS' ,'VHF' ,'VIBOTHER' ,'VIBPARA' ,'VIBVUL' ,'VISA' ,'VRSA' ,'WEE' ,'WNF' ,'WNI' ,'WNVU' ,'YER' ,'YF' ,'ZIKA' ) AND c.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2017' AND ira.[NAME] IN ('Result', 'ResultValue', 'Test') AND c.[STATUS] = 0 AND c.[TYPE] = 1 ) AS ti1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * ,CASE WHEN reference_group = 'HEALTH_FACILITY' THEN 'OrderingFacility' WHEN reference_group = 'LAB_FACILITY' THEN 'LabFacility' WHEN reference_group = 'LOINC' AND SUBGROUP <> 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SNOMED_LABTEST' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SPECIMEN_SOURCES' THEN 'SpecimenInfo' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY' THEN 'Susceptibility' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' THEN 'Susceptibility' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Susceptibility' END AS ReferenceQuestionType ,CASE WHEN reference_group = 'HEALTH_FACILITY' THEN 'Facility' WHEN reference_group = 'LAB_FACILITY' THEN 'Facility' WHEN reference_group = 'LOINC' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SNOMED_LABTEST' THEN 'Result' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SPECIMEN_SOURCES' THEN 'SpecimenSource' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY' THEN 'Result' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' THEN 'Method' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Test' END AS ReferenceQuestion FROM [IDS_REFERENCE_CODE] WHERE reference_group IN ( 'HEALTH_FACILITY' ,'LAB_FACILITY' ,'LOINC' ,'SNOMED' ,'SUSCEPTIBILITY' ,'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' ) ) AS trc ON ti1.Value = trc.REFERENCE_CODE AND ti1.Question = trc.ReferenceQuestion AND ti1.QuestionType = trc.ReferenceQuestionType ) AS t1t2 WHERE coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) IS NOT NULL AND CaseStatus NOT IN ('Batch Closed', 'Manually Closed') AND UNID IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_QUESTIONSET] qs ON c.[UNID] = qs.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_ANSWER] a ON qs.[UNID] = a.[QUESTIONSET_ID] WHERE p.CODE IN ( 'ANTH' ,'BOT' ,'BOTFDB' ,'BOTI' ,'BOTWND' ,'BRU' ,'BURK' ,'CAC' ,'CALI' ,'CHAGAS' ,'CHAGASCS' ,'CHAGASI' ,'CHIKV' ,'CHIKVNN' ,'CHOLERA' ,'CJD' ,'CRYPT' ,'CYCLO' ,'CYSTI' ,'DENGUE' ,'DHF' ,'DIP' ,'ECOLI' ,'FLUD' ,'FLUH1N1' ,'HANTA' ,'HEPA' ,'HEPB_PT' ,'HFLU' ,'HOOK' ,'HUS' ,'JAM' ,'JAP' ,'LAC' ,'LEG' ,'MAL' ,'MEAS' ,'MENB' ,'MENF' ,'MENP' ,'MERS' ,'MPOX' ,'MUMPS' ,'NMEN' ,'PERT' ,'PLAG' ,'POL' ,'POW' ,'QF' ,'QFACUTE' ,'QFCHRONIC' ,'RUB' ,'RUBCONG' ,'SARS' ,'SMPOX' ,'TOXIN' ,'TUL' ,'TYPH' ,'TYPHCAR' ,'TYPHOID' ,'TYPHUS' ,'VHF' ,'VIBOTHER' ,'VIBPARA' ,'VIBVUL' ,'VISA' ,'VRSA' ,'WEE' ,'WNF' ,'WNI' ,'WNVU' ,'YER' ,'YF' ,'ZIKA' ) GROUP BY c.[UNID] HAVING ( MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[VALUE] else NULL End) = 'P' OR MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[VALUE] else NULL End) IS NULL ) AND MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] = 'MMWR_YEAR' then a.[VALUE] End) IN ('18') ) group by UNID ,INVESTIG_UNID HAVING MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Result' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE (case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'ResultValue' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) End) NOT IN ('No growth' ,'Non Reactive' ,'Not detected' ,'not isolated' ,'Negative' ,'Below threshold level (qualifier value)' ,'Analyte not detected' ,'Unsatisfactory' ) AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'RUBV IgG%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'MeV IgG%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'MuV IgG%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HBV core Ab%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HBV DNA%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HBV e%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HBV surface%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'Hepatitis B%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HAV IgG%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HAV Ab Ser Ql%'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Arbonet - CDC Reportable Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Mark the checkbox for those cases ready to report to CDC and click the "Report to CDC" button.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.CODE IN ('EEE', 'LAC', 'ARB', 'WNI') AND cs.unid IN (SELECT COALESCE(q.case_id, q.case_id) FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id = q.unid AND q.questionset_id = 'ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'REPORT_TO_CDC_YES') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT attr.unid FROM ids_case_attribute attr WHERE attr.name = 'cdc.report.pending' AND attr.case_id = cs.unid)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Area A Events (All)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: General Surveillance Cases in Area A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Area A Events (OOJ)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: General Surveillance Cases in Area A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Area A Events (Open)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: General Surveillance Cases in Area A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Area A Events (Open) (1)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: General Surveillance Cases in Area A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: AssignTasktoOutbreakCase
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Assign Tasks to Outbreak Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.TYPE<10 AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.TARGET_CASE_ID=( SELECT c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c WHERE c.CASE_ID=100015600 AND c.TYPE=10 ) AND l.TYPE <> 32 ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.TARGET_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=( SELECT c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c WHERE c.CASE_ID=100015600 AND c.TYPE=10 ) AND l.TYPE <> 32 ) )
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Case.Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION=48043; Case.Status =4; Task.Type=10; Task.Status = 'Completed';

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Bacterial STDS Where Treatment is Incomplete
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: End date required for treatments
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('CHANCROID', 'CHLAMYDIA', 'GONOR', 'GRANUL', 'LGRANUL', 'NGURETH', 'OPTHNEO', 'PID') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id IN ('DISEASE_STATUS_CONTACT', 'DISEASE_STATUS_UNDER_INVESTIGATION', 'DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED') ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.* FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset c WHERE a.question_id = 'ANTIBIOTIC_START_DATE' AND a.questionset_id = c.unid AND c.case_id = cs.unid AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT b.unid FROM ids_answer b WHERE b.iteration = a.iteration AND b.questionset_id = a.questionset_id AND b.question_id IN ('ANTIBIOTIC_END_DATE', 'ANTIBIOTIC_DAYS_KNOWN') ) ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.* FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset c WHERE a.question_id = 'ANTIBIOTIC_SECONDARY_START_DATE' AND a.questionset_id = c.unid AND c.case_id = cs.unid AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT b.unid FROM ids_answer b WHERE b.iteration = a.iteration AND b.questionset_id = a.questionset_id AND b.question_id IN ('ANTIBIOTIC_SECONDARY_DAYS_KNOWN_YES', 'ANTIBIOTIC_SECONDARY_NUMBER_DAYS') ) ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close 2013 Cases Pending (Foodborne)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close 2013 Cases Pending (Foodborne)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '13' AND (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS <>'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS<>'O - Out of Jurisdiction')
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N;Case.Status=4

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close 2013 Cases Pending (GS)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close 2013 Cases Pending (GS)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '13' AND (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'P - Pending investigation' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = NULL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = NO; Case.Status = 4; Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS=N; Task.Status=2

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close Cases Imported From NBS
Batch Close Flu
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close Flu
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '17' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '16' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '18' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR > '18') AND Case.Status<>4
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close HAV AB (Multiple Labs)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close HAV Ab Ser QI/EIA
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('13951-9','20575-7','32018-4','22313-1') AND c.[TYPE] <> '4' AND c.[STATUS] IN ('0','6') AND p.[CODE] = 'HEPA' GROUP BY c.unid ) AND c.create_date >= getdate()-2 GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) > 1
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION= 48043; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close HAV AB (One Lab Only)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close HAV Ab Ser QI/EIA
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p (nolock) on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp (nolock) on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv (nolock) on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir (nolock) on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira (nolock) on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p (nolock) on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp (nolock) on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv (nolock) on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir (nolock) on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira (nolock) on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('13951-9','20575-7','32018-4','22313-1') AND c.[TYPE] <> '4' AND c.[STATUS] IN ('0','6') AND p.[CODE] = 'HEPA' GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) = 1
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION= 48043; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close HAV AB (Original)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close HAV Ab Ser QI/EIA
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '16' AND (Investigation.Test.Test='13951-9' OR Investigation.Test.Test='20575-7' OR Investigation.Test.Test='32018-4' OR Investigation.Test.Test='22313-1') AND Case.Status<>4 and Case.CreateDate >ComputeDate(TODAY, -2)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close HBV AB Immune(One Lab Only)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close HBV AB Immune (One Lab Only)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('2322-2' ,'5193-8' ,'10900-9' ,'5196-1' ,'16935-9' ,'79409-3') AND c.[TYPE] <> '4' AND c.[STATUS] IN ('0','6') AND p.[CODE] = 'HEPB_B' GROUP BY c.unid ) AND c.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2019' GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) = 1
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION= 48043; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close HBV ag (One Lab Only)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close HBV ag (One Lab Only)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p (nolock) on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp (nolock) on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv (nolock) on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir (nolock) on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira (nolock) on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p (nolock) on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp (nolock) on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv (nolock) on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir (nolock) on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira (nolock) on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND c.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2019' AND ira.[VALUE] IN ('47364-5' ,'50967-9' ,'5195-3' ,'5196-1' ,'63557-3' ,'65633-0' ,'7905-3') AND c.[TYPE] <> '4' AND c.[STATUS] IN ('0','6') AND p.[CODE] = 'HEPB_A' GROUP BY c.unid ) AND c.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2019' GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) = 1
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION= 48043; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close Hep A
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'P - Pending investigation' AND Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '10' AND Answer.MMWR_WEEK < '27' AND Answer.REPORT_TO_CDC <> 'Yes'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = N;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close Immune HepB
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Immune Hepatitis B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '18' AND (Investigation.Test.Test='22322-2' OR Investigation.Test.Test='10900-9' OR Investigation.Test.Test='16935-9' OR Investigation.Test.Test='5193-8' OR Investigation.Test.Test='75409-3') AND (Investigation.Test.Result='10828004' OR Investigation.Test.Result='11214006') AND Case.Status<>4 and Case.Type = 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Closes Influenza cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL.Value = 'YES'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = NO; Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'N - Non reportable'; Case.Status = 4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close MRSA
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close MRSA
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '15' AND Case.Status<>4
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close MRSA (2018)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close MRSA
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '15' AND Case.Status<>4
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close MRSA (with LOINCS)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close MRSA
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '17' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '16' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '15') AND (Investigation.Test.Test='35492-8' OR Investigation.Test.Test='610-6' OR Investigation.Test.Test='6463-4' OR Investigation.Test.Test='630-4' OR Investigation.Test.Test='43408-4' OR Investigation.Test.Test='13317-3' OR Investigation.Test.Test='600-7' OR Investigation.Test.Test='19128-8') AND Case.Status<>4
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close Measles (0 events < 30 days apart)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Auto batch close measles events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN IDS_PARTY pty on parp.PARTY_ID = pty.UNID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.[STATUS] IN ('0','6') AND c.type = 1 AND c.type = 1 AND p.[CODE] = 'MEAS' AND c.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN getdate()-30 AND getdate() AND pty.UNID NOT IN ( SELECT parp.[PARTY_ID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTY] pty ON parp.[PARTY_ID] = pty.[UNID] WHERE p.CODE = 'MEAS' AND c.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN getdate()-30 AND getdate() GROUP BY parp.[PARTY_ID] HAVING count(*) >1 ) GROUP BY c.unid
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION= 48043; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close Measles (2 events < 30 days apart)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Inspect each measles event and party history before closing
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.type = 1 AND c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('25299-9', '29242-5', '20479-2', '35275-7', '21501-2' ) AND c.[STATUS] IN ('0','6') AND p.[CODE] = 'MEAS' GROUP BY c.unid ) AND c.unid NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN IDS_PARTY pty on parp.PARTY_ID = pty.UNID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.[STATUS] IN ('0','6') AND p.[CODE] = 'MEAS' AND c.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN getdate()-30 AND getdate() AND pty.UNID NOT IN ( SELECT parp.[PARTY_ID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTY] pty ON parp.[PARTY_ID] = pty.[UNID] WHERE p.CODE = 'MEAS' AND c.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN getdate()-30 AND getdate() GROUP BY parp.[PARTY_ID] HAVING count(*) >1 ) GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) = 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTY] pty ON parp.[PARTY_ID] = pty.[UNID] WHERE p.CODE = 'MUMPS' AND c.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN getdate()-30 AND getdate() GROUP BY parp.[PARTY_ID] HAVING count(*) >1 ) GROUP WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close Varicella IgG (One Lab Only)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close HAV Ab Ser QI/EIA
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('53534-4' ,'29249-0','15410-4' ,'19162-7') AND c.[TYPE] <> '4' AND c.[STATUS] IN ('0','6') AND p.[CODE] = 'CPOX' GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) = 1
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION= 48043; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close Varicella IgG All Events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close Varicella IgG
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '15' AND (Investigation.Test.Test='53534-4' OR Investigation.Test.Test='29249-0' OR Investigation.Test.Test='15410-4' OR Investigation.Test.Test='19162-7') AND Case.Status<>4 AND Case.Type = 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Close Zika
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Nonreportable negative Zika
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '19' AND (Investigation.Test.Test='80619-0' OR Investigation.Test.Test='79190-5' OR Investigation.Test.Test='80618-2' OR Investigation.Test.Test='80824-6' OR Investigation.Test.Test='85622-9' OR Investigation.Test.Test='85623-7') AND (Investigation.Test.Result='260385009' OR Investigation.Test.Result='260415000') AND Case.Status<>4 and Case.Type = 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Batch Open Closed Cases 2010
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Opening 2010 Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '10' AND Answer.MMWR_WEEK < '27' AND (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'P - Pending investigation' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = NULL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status = 0

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: BatchCloseOutbreakCase
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close Outbreak Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.TYPE<10 AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.TARGET_CASE_ID=( SELECT c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c WHERE c.CASE_ID=100313243 AND c.TYPE=10 ) AND l.TYPE <> 32 ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.TARGET_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=( SELECT c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c WHERE c.CASE_ID=100313243 AND c.TYPE=10 ) AND l.TYPE <> 32 ) )
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Case.Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION=48043; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Borrelia Miyamotoi
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Tick-borne relapsing fever

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID 19: HHD(+) Tasks(-) 1st PCR Spec Date <=10 days ago
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT t1.UNID FROM (select c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c LEFT JOIN IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT eo on c.UNID = eo.CASE_ID group by c.UNID HAVING max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_PyGeocoder_Jur' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'Houston' AND cast(max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_1st_PcrPos_SpecDate' then eo.[VALUE] end) AS date) BETWEEN dateadd(day,-10, cast(getdate() AS date)) AND cast(getdate() AS date) ) AS t1 LEFT JOIN IDS_TASK tk on t1.UNID= tk.CASE_ID WHERE tk.UNID IS NULL group by t1.UNID

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID Orphaned Cases Open <=28 days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open Cases/Tasks of COVID Team Members
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT dd.CASE_UNID FROM DD_LAB_RESULTS_COVID_2 dd JOIN IDS_TASK t on dd.CASE_UNID = t.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_USERGROUP ug on t.USERGROUP_ID = ug.UNID JOIN IDS_CASE c on dd.CASE_UNID = c.UNID WHERE 1=1 AND dd.TEST_CODE IN ('94759-8','321','322','41458-1','94306-8','94309-2', '94500-6','94534-5', '94559-2','94565-9') AND dd.RESULT_CODE IN ('10828004','260408008','260373001','983','961') AND t.USER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM IDS_USERGROUP_MEMBERSHIP WHERE GROUP_ID IN ( SELECT UNID FROM IDS_USERGROUP WHERE NAME NOT IN ('1 COVID' ,'10 COVID' ,'11 COVID' ,'12 COVID' ,'13 COVID' ,'14 COVID' ,'15 COVID' ,'16 COVID' ,'2 COVID' ,'3 COVID' ,'4 COVID' ,'5 COVID' ,'6 COVID' ,'7 COVID' ,'8 COVID' ,'9 COVID') ) ) AND (c.STATUS = 0 OR t.STATUS IN (0,1,3)) group by dd.EVENT_ID ,dd.CASE_UNID ,dd.OUTPUT_PY_GEOCODER_JUR ,cast(dd.CASE_CREATE_DATE AS date) HAVING 1=1 AND coalesce(min(dd.SPECIMEN_DATE) ,min(dd.LAB_CREATE_DATE)) >= DATEADD(day,-28,getdate())

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID Team 01 Open <=28 days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open Cases/Tasks of COVID Team Members
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CASE_UNID FROM DD_LAB_RESULTS_COVID_2 dd JOIN IDS_TASK t on dd.CASE_UNID = t.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_USERGROUP ug on t.USERGROUP_ID = ug.UNID JOIN IDS_CASE c on dd.CASE_UNID = c.UNID WHERE 1=1 AND dd.TEST_CODE IN ('94759-8','321','322','41458-1','94306-8','94309-2', '94500-6','94534-5', '94559-2','94565-9') AND dd.RESULT_CODE IN ('10828004','260408008','260373001','983','961') AND t.USER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM IDS_USERGROUP_MEMBERSHIP WHERE GROUP_ID = ( SELECT UNID FROM IDS_USERGROUP WHERE NAME = '1 COVID' ) ) AND (c.STATUS = 0 OR t.STATUS IN (0,1,3)) group by dd.EVENT_ID ,dd.CASE_UNID ,dd.OUTPUT_PY_GEOCODER_JUR ,cast(dd.CASE_CREATE_DATE AS date) HAVING 1=1 AND coalesce(min(dd.SPECIMEN_DATE) ,min(dd.LAB_CREATE_DATE)) >= DATEADD(day,-28,getdate())

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID Team 11 Open <=28 days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open Cases/Tasks of COVID Team Members
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT CASE_UNID FROM DD_LAB_RESULTS_COVID_2 dd JOIN IDS_TASK t on dd.CASE_UNID = t.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_USERGROUP ug on t.USERGROUP_ID = ug.UNID JOIN IDS_CASE c on dd.CASE_UNID = c.UNID WHERE 1=1 AND dd.TEST_CODE IN ('94759-8','321','322','41458-1','94306-8','94309-2', '94500-6','94534-5', '94559-2','94565-9') AND dd.RESULT_CODE IN ('10828004','260408008','260373001','983','961') AND t.USER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM IDS_USERGROUP_MEMBERSHIP WHERE GROUP_ID = ( SELECT UNID FROM IDS_USERGROUP WHERE NAME = '11 COVID' ) ) AND (c.STATUS = 0 OR t.STATUS IN (0,1,3)) group by dd.EVENT_ID ,dd.CASE_UNID ,dd.OUTPUT_PY_GEOCODER_JUR ,cast(dd.CASE_CREATE_DATE AS date) HAVING 1=1 AND coalesce(min(dd.SPECIMEN_DATE) ,min(dd.LAB_CREATE_DATE)) >= DATEADD(day,-28,getdate())

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID Team Nursing Home Clusters
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Active Outbreaks
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM ids_case c JOIN IDS_PARTICIPANT pt on c.UNID = pt.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_PARTY pty on pt.PARTY_ID = pty.UNID JOIN ( SELECT VALUE, DISPLAY_NAME AS TYPE FROM IDS_ENUM_ENTRY WHERE ENUM_NAME = 'Case.Type' ) x2 on c.TYPE = x2.VALUE WHERE 1=1 AND x2.TYPE='Cluster' AND (pty.FULL_NAME LIKE '%covid%' OR pty.FULL_NAME LIKE '%LTCF%') AND pty.FULL_NAME NOT LIKE '%school%' AND pty.FULL_NAME NOT LIKE '%academy%'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID Team Nursing Home Open Cases Modified(Exp)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT DISTINCT c.[UNID], ug.NAME FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN IDS_TASK t on c.UNID = t.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_USERGROUP ug on t.USERGROUP_ID = ug.UNID WHERE 1=1 AND ( ug.NAME = 'Team 5 - Nursing Home' OR t.USER_ID IN ( SELECT USER_ID FROM IDS_USERGROUP_MEMBERSHIP WHERE GROUP_ID = ( SELECT UNID FROM IDS_USERGROUP WHERE NAME = 'Team 5 - Nursing Home' ) ) ) AND c.STATUS NOT IN (3,4) order by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID Team Nursing Home Open Cases(Exp)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT DISTINCT c.[UNID], ug.NAME FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN IDS_TASK t on c.UNID = t.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_USERGROUP ug on t.USERGROUP_ID = ug.UNID WHERE 1=1 AND ug.NAME = 'Team 5 - Nursing Home' AND c.STATUS NOT IN (3,4) order by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID Team Nursing Home(Exp)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT DISTINCT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN IDS_TASK t on c.UNID = t.CASE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND t.USERGROUP_ID IN (3054089580) order by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 All Events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.CreateDate >= '01/01/2000'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 All Events (<05/31/2020)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Covid cases on or before 05/31/2020
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.CreateDate <'06/01//2020'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 All Events (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: no filters
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 All Events (SQL) (official place)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: no filters
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 All Events with official place (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: no filters
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 Events with at least 1 (+) lab
COVID-19 Events with at least one (+) lab (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 Events with at least one (+) lab (SQL) (op)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 Events with no (+) lab
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: <>260373001 AND <>961 (can include no tests)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Investigation.Test.Result<>260373001 AND Investigation.Test.Result<>961

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 Events with no (+) labs (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All events minus those with (+) labs
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND c.[UNID] NOT IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE' ) group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 Events with no (+) labs (SQL) (op)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All events minus those with (+) labs
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') AND c.[UNID] NOT IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE IN ('WUHAN_NCOV') group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE' ) group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 Events with only (-) Lab
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: <>260373001 AND <>961 AND <>NULL (1+ lab required)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Investigation.Test.Result<>260373001 AND Investigation.Test.Result<>961 AND Investigation.Test.Result<>NULL

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 positive IG (HHD)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] JOIN [IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT] eo on c.[UNID] = eo.CASE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE = 'WUHAN_NCOV' group by c.[UNID] HAVING 1=1 AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_LabResult' then eo.[VALUE] end) IS NULL AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_LabResult_Ig ' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'Ig_Positive' AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_PyGeocoder_Jur' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'Houston'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID-19 positive IG (any)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] JOIN [IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT] eo on c.[UNID] = eo.CASE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE = 'WUHAN_NCOV' group by c.[UNID] HAVING 1=1 AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_LabResult_Ig ' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'Ig_Positive'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Campy test
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.CreateDate >= '07/01/2020'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Candida Auris
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '15'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area A)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area A)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Answer.MMWR_YEAR ='15') AND Answer.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA='Area A' AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'N - Non reportable' AND (Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0489370' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0489821' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0490011' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0490893' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0491435' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0493939' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0494559' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0668777' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0710196' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0899528' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0936258' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D1054348' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D1099818' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2004217' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2004763' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0660081' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0660146' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0492541' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2023783' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2042110' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0703562' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA=NULL)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area A)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area B)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area B)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Answer.MMWR_YEAR ='16') AND Answer.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA='Area B' AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'N - Non reportable' AND (Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2042110' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='05D0643352' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='24D0400424' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='34D0655059' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0660644' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0697943' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='46D0523979' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0502685' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0505003' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='24D0404292' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='31D0938156' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='05D0713514' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA=NULL)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area B) (2018)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area B)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area C)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area C)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Answer.MMWR_YEAR ='16') AND Answer.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA='Area C' AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'N - Non reportable' AND (Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0493380' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0053108' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0490589' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0494884' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0495968' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0660248' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0669498' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0681848' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0701123' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA=NULL)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area C) (2018)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (Area C)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (ZPR)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (ZPR)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Answer.MMWR_YEAR ='16' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR ='17') AND Answer.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA='Zika Pregnancy Registry Program' AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'N - Non reportable'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (ZPR) (2018)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Closed and Marked as 'Non Reportable' (ZPR)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '16' AND Answer.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA='Zika Pregnancy Registry Program' AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'N - Non reportable'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases GeoCoded
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases that are geocoded
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party, IDS_CONTACTPOINT cp WHERE cs.UNID=part.CASE_ID AND part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.UNID=cp.PARTY_ID AND cp.GEOCODE_STATUS=1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Pending Data Collection
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases pending data collection
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM IDS_CASE WHERE status = 0 order by CREATE_DATE

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Pending GeoCoding
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases pending geocoding
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party, IDS_CONTACTPOINT cp WHERE cs.UNID=part.CASE_ID AND part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.UNID=cp.PARTY_ID AND cp.GEOCODE_STATUS=0

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Pending or Blank Status
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases that are pending or have a blank status
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '18' AND (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'P - Pending investigation' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = NULL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Pending or Blank Status (1)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases that are pending or have a blank status
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '18' AND (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'P - Pending investigation') OR (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = NULL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Pending or Blank Status (Area A)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases that are pending or have a blank status in Area A
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '17' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '16' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR ='15') AND (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'P - Pending investigation' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = NULL) AND Answer.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA='Area A' AND (Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0489370' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0489821' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0490011' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0490893' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0491435' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0493939' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0494559' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0668777' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0710196' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0899528' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0936258' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D1054348' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D1099818' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2004217' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2004763' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2023783' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D2042110' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0703562' OR Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA=NULL)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases that are pending or have a blank status in Area A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Cases Pending or Blank Status (Area A) (2018) (1)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases that are pending or have a blank status in Area A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Congenital Syphilis Cases Urgent Review Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Congenital Syphilis cases requiring urgent review.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND product.CODE='CONGSYPH' AND cs.STATUS IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND DATEDIFF(minute, cs.MODIFICATION_DATE, cs.CREATE_DATE) < 5

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Current date test

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Delivery Notification
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Delivery Notification
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'MEAS', 'RUB', 'AIDS', 'HIV') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'CURRENTLY_PREGNANT_YES' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'CURRENTLY_PREGNANT_DELIVERY_DATE' AND a.date_value <= $TODAY$ AND a.date_value > $TODAY-14$ ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id LIKE 'CHILD_VITAL_STATUS%')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Feeds for GCD and VPD
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes' AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Case.ModificationDate >='12/01/2016'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Detected Unknowns (Corona) (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Corona ELRs that come in as Unknown
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ira.[VALUE] IN ('35659-2', '94306-8', '41458-1','94500-6', '94309-2', '94563-4', 'DETCNCOVP') AND c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' group by c.unid HAVING max(case when ira.NAME = 'TestLocalCode' then ira.[VALUE] end) IS NOT NULL

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Detected Unknowns (Corona) (SQL) (+)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Corona ELRs that come in as Unknown
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND ira.[VALUE] IN ('35659-2', '94306-8', '41458-1','94500-6', '94309-2', '94563-4', 'DETCNCOVP') AND c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'WUHAN_NCOV' group by c.unid HAVING max(case when ira.NAME = 'TestLocalCode' then ira.[VALUE] end) IS NOT NULL

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - HIV - HDHHS BLS This Month
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab created in this month
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cse.unid FROM ( (select cs.unid, cs.case_id, cs.product_id, pro.code FROM ids_case cs, ids_product pro WHERE cs.product_id=pro.unid AND pro.code LIKE 'HIV') AS cse LEFT JOIN (select pa.unid participantID, cs.unid caseID, par.unid partyID FROM ids_participant pa, ids_case cs, ids_party par WHERE pa.case_id=cs.unid AND pa.party_id=par.unid) AS participant on participant.caseID=cse.unid) LEFT JOIN (select inv.unid invid, inv. participant_id pa_id, inv.create_date, invr.unid invrid, invr.result_code,invra.name,IIf(invra.name LIKE 'CLIA%', invra.value,'N/A') AS 'CLIA' FROM (ids_investigation inv LEFT JOIN ids_investigation_result invr on inv.unid=invr.investigation_id) LEFT JOIN ids_investigation_result_attr invra on invr.unid=invra.investigation_result_id WHERE invr.result_code LIKE 'LabFacility%' AND invra.name LIKE 'CLIA' AND invra.value IN ('45D0660081', '45D0914250')) AS lab on lab.pa_id=participant.participantID WHERE lab.create_date>GETDATE() - 30

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - HIV - HDHHS BLS This Week
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab created in this week
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cse.unid FROM ( (select cs.unid, cs.case_id, cs.product_id, pro.code FROM ids_case cs, ids_product pro WHERE cs.product_id=pro.unid AND pro.code LIKE 'HIV') AS cse LEFT JOIN (select pa.unid participantID, cs.unid caseID, par.unid partyID FROM ids_participant pa, ids_case cs, ids_party par WHERE pa.case_id=cs.unid AND pa.party_id=par.unid) AS participant on participant.caseID=cse.unid) LEFT JOIN (select inv.unid invid, inv. participant_id pa_id, inv.create_date, invr.unid invrid, invr.result_code,invra.name,IIf(invra.name LIKE 'CLIA%', invra.value,'N/A') AS 'CLIA' FROM (ids_investigation inv LEFT JOIN ids_investigation_result invr on inv.unid=invr.investigation_id) LEFT JOIN ids_investigation_result_attr invra on invr.unid=invra.investigation_result_id WHERE invr.result_code LIKE 'LabFacility%' AND invra.name LIKE 'CLIA' AND invra.value IN ('45D0660081', '45D0914250')) AS lab on lab.pa_id=participant.participantID WHERE lab.create_date>GETDATE() - 7

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - HIV - HDHHS BLS Yesterday
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab created since yesterday
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cse.unid FROM ( (select cs.unid, cs.case_id, cs.product_id, pro.code FROM ids_case cs, ids_product pro WHERE cs.product_id=pro.unid AND pro.code LIKE 'HIV') AS cse LEFT JOIN (select pa.unid participantID, cs.unid caseID, par.unid partyID FROM ids_participant pa, ids_case cs, ids_party par WHERE pa.case_id=cs.unid AND pa.party_id=par.unid) AS participant on participant.caseID=cse.unid) LEFT JOIN (select inv.unid invid, inv. participant_id pa_id, inv.create_date, invr.unid invrid, invr.result_code,invra.name,IIf(invra.name LIKE 'CLIA%', invra.value,'N/A') AS 'CLIA' FROM (ids_investigation inv LEFT JOIN ids_investigation_result invr on inv.unid=invr.investigation_id) LEFT JOIN ids_investigation_result_attr invra on invr.unid=invra.investigation_result_id WHERE invr.result_code LIKE 'LabFacility%' AND invra.name LIKE 'CLIA' AND invra.value IN ('45D0660081', '45D0914250')) AS lab on lab.pa_id=participant.participantID WHERE lab.create_date>GETDATE() -1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Hepatitis B-positive children <2 years of age
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB+ children aged <=2 years
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Case.Type=1 AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes' AND Question.AGE.Value<=2)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status = 0; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = NO; Case.Status = 4

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Hepatitis B-positive females of childbearing age
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB+ females aged 13-55
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes' AND Party.Gender=1 AND Question.AGE.Value<=55 AND Question.AGE.Value>=13 AND Case.CreateDate >= '02/20/2018'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status = 0; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = NO; Case.Status = 4

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - STD
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Syphilis J28
