WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All ELRs that come in as Unknown

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (1)(Rak)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All ELRs that come in as Unknown

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (All Others) (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All ELRs marked Unknown that are not filtered elsewhere
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] (NOLOCK) c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p (NOLOCK) ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp (NOLOCK) ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] WHERE c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' AND c.[STATUS] IN ('0','1','13','14','15','16','17','2','30','31','36','38','7','8') AND 1<> ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) =1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir(NOLOCK) ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira (NOLOCK) ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE inv.PARTICIPANT_ID = parp.[UNID] AND ira.[VALUE] IN ('24312-1' , '24110-9', '22587-0', '47236-5') AND ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir(NOLOCK) ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira (NOLOCK) ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE inv.PARTICIPANT_ID = parp.[UNID] AND ira.[VALUE] IN ('11011-4' ,'14363-6' ,'20416-4' ,'20447-9' ,'20508-8' ,'22322-2' ,'22587-0' ,'23869-1' ,'23979-8' ,'24110-9' ,'24312-1' ,'25835-0' ,'28037-0' ,'29615-2' ,'30361-0' ,'31147-2' ,'32286-7' ,'41009-2' ,'42595-9' ,'42931-6' ,'43304-5' ,'47236-5' ,'49524-2' ,'5195-3' ,'5313-2' ,'5671-3' ,'56888-1' ,'586-8' ,'593-4' ,'60256-5' ,'625-4' ,'630-4' ,'68961-2' ,'69668-2' ,'77307-7' ,'80824-6' ,'8128-1' ,'85622-9' ,'85623-7','60255-7', '80366-8' ) AND ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (All Others) (retired)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All ELRs marked Unknown that are not filtered elsewhere
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' AND c.STATUS IN ('0','1','13','14','15','16','17','2','30','31','36','38','7','8') AND c.unid NOT IN ( SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('29615-2','24312-1', '31147-2', '8128-1','5671-3', '23869-1', '56888-1', '43304-5', '77307-7', '24110-9', '42595-9', '49524-2', '30361-0', '42931-6', '80824-6', '60256-5', '5195-3', '593-4', '625-4','20416-4','11011-4','85622-9','85623-7','23979-8','28037-0','20508-8', '5313-2', '22322-2', '630-4', '32286-7') AND c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) = 1 ) GROUP BY c.unid

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (Bacterial susceptibility panel) (Expression)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Bacterial susceptibility panel ELRs that come in as Unknown
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Investigation.Test.Test = '29576-6'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (Bacterial susceptibility panel) (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Bacterial susceptibility panel ELRs that come in as Unknown
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('29576-6') AND c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) >= 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (C trachomatis) (Expression)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: C trachomatis ELRs that come in as Unknown

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (C trachomatis) (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: C trachomatis that come in as Unknown
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('43304-5', '42931-6', '6357-8', '16600-9', '14510-2') AND c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) >= 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('49524-2') AND c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) >= 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (Grp B Strep) (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Grp B Strep ELRs that come in as Unknown
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('586-8', '14363-6', '630-4') AND c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) >= 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (Zika) (SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Zika ELRs that come in as Unknown
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE c.unid IN ( SELECT DISTINCT c.unid FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE ira.[VALUE] IN ('80824-6','85622-9','85623-7') AND c.[TYPE] = '1' AND p.[CODE] = 'UNKNOWN' GROUP BY c.unid ) GROUP BY c.unid HAVING SUM(case WHEN ir.[RESULT_CODE] = 'Test' AND ira.[NAME] = 'Test' then 1 End) >= 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - Unknowns (_SQL)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All ELRs marked Unknown that are not filtered elsewhere
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM IDS_CASE WHERE 1=1 AND PRODUCT_ID = 12788700 AND TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 0

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - VPD
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: ELR Feeds
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - VPD (Houston)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: ELR cases that are in Houston's Jurisdiction
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes' AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.OWNING_JURISDICTION_GIS = Houston

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - VPD (No Address)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: ELR cases without addresses
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes' AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.OWNING_JURISDICTION_GIS = NULL AND GEOCODE_STATUS <> 0

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - VPD (OOJ)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: ELR cases that are out of Houston's Jurisdiction
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes' AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.OWNING_JURISDICTION_GIS <> Houston AND Answer.OWNING_JURISDICTION_GIS<> NULL

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds - VPD (Rubella)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Feeds(Rak)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Feeds for VPD
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes' AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Case.ModificationDate >='12/01/2018'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Ghosts
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open ELRs Missing CLIA number
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA = NULL AND Question.MMWR_YEAR.Value >= '18' and Case.Type = 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Ghosts (All Disease)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open ELRs Missing CLIA number
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA = NULL AND Question.MMWR_YEAR.Value >= '18' and Case.Type = 1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR HAV IGM
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab with HAV IgM
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: (Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '16' OR Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '17') AND (Investigation.Test.Test='13950-1' OR Investigation.Test.Test='22314-9' OR Investigation.Test.Test='5182-1' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR HAV IGM (2018)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab with HAV IgM
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '16' AND (Investigation.Test.Test='13950-1' OR Investigation.Test.Test='22314-9' OR Investigation.Test.Test='5182-1' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ELR Orphans
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: ELRs from CLIAs not assigned to Area Teams
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs JOIN IDS_PRODUCT p on cs.PRODUCT_ID = p.UNID JOIN IDS_PARTICIPANT part on cs.UNID = part.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_INVESTIGATION inv on part.UNID = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID JOIN IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT invr on inv.UNID = invr.INVESTIGATION_ID JOIN IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR attr on invr.UNID = attr.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID JOIN [IDS_QUESTIONSET] qs on cs.[UNID] = qs.[CASE_ID] JOIN [IDS_ANSWER] a on qs.[UNID] = a.[QUESTIONSET_ID] WHERE cs.TYPE = 1 AND cs.STATUS = 0 AND cs.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2018' AND p.PREFERRED_MODEL IN ('GCDCSurveillanceModel' ,'VPDSurveillanceModel') AND p.CODE NOT IN ('HEPB_A','HEPB_C', 'HEPC_C', 'HEPB_U', 'GIAR' ,'HGQ' ,'HGQL' ,'PFGE', 'MRSA' ,'RAB' ,'REDC' ,'SCAB' ,'SFLU' ,'SHELT' ,'SHINGLES' ,'TOXIN' ,'TRAN' ,'HEPB_P' ,'HEPB_PT' ) AND attr.NAME = 'CLIA' AND attr.VALUE IN ( '05D0550302', '05D0643850', '05D0644251', '05D0941934', '06D0880233', '06D2096269', '10D0645475', '11D0668319', '11D2030855', '14D0646470', '17D0648226', '24D1040592', '26D0983643', '26D0983643', '26D2027335', '31D0652945', '34D0655205', '44D0915029', '45D0053104', '45D0480722', '45D0483323', '45D0486110', '45D0488073', '45D0489340', '45D0489693', '45D0492871', '45D0494194', '45D0495215', '45D0496189', '45D0503473', '45D0505003', '45D0659907', '45D0659966', '45D0660035', '45D0660150', '45D0660152', '45D0660281', '45D0660475', '45D0660741', '45D0663318', '45D0668729', '45D0680310', '45D0683856', '45D0706889', '45D0987928', '45D0994183', '45D0994188', '45D1010313', '45D1013919', '45d1061571', '45D1087155', '45D2005774', '45D2006820', '45D2014519', '45D2040725', '45D2057854', '45D2072606', '45D2076850', '45D2106746', '49D0221801', '49D0660281', '52D0669558' ) group by cs.UNID HAVING MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA%' then a.[VALUE] end) IS NULL order by cs.UNID

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Errors GeoCoding
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases that had errors trying to geocode
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party, IDS_CONTACTPOINT cp WHERE cs.UNID=part.CASE_ID AND part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.UNID=cp.PARTY_ID AND cp.GEOCODE_STATUS=-1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Events locked for offline investigation
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Events locked for offline investigation
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM ids_case cs WHERE cs.LOCKED_BY_ID IS NOT NULL

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Events with system generated concerns
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Events with system generated concerns
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.unid FROM ids_case cs, ids_participant p, ids_concern c WHERE cs.unid=p.case_id AND c.participant_id=p.unid AND cs.type < 10 AND cs.status=0 AND c.status=0 AND c.manual=0

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Events with updated outbreak question packages
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Events with updated outbreak question packages
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.unid FROM ids_case cs, ids_case outbreak, ids_addl_question_pkg aq WHERE cs.type < 10 AND cs.status=0 AND outbreak.type = 10 AND outbreak.unid=aq.cluster_case_id AND aq.MODIFICATION_DATE > cs.MODIFICATION_DATE AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.TARGET_CASE_ID=outbreak.UNID ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.TARGET_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=outbreak.UNID ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Events with user generated concerns
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Events with user generated concerns
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.unid FROM ids_case cs, ids_participant p, ids_concern c WHERE cs.unid=p.case_id AND c.participant_id=p.unid AND cs.type < 10 AND cs.status=0 AND c.status=0 AND c.manual=1

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC & VPD Cases Not Closed in 30 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Close the event
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.type < 10 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('ANTH', 'VHF', 'PLAG', 'SMPOX', 'VAC', 'BOT', 'BOTI', 'CAMP', 'CHOLERA', 'CYCLO', 'ECOLI', 'CPERF', 'FBOTHER', 'STAPH', 'FBPOIS', 'HUS', 'LIST', 'SAL', 'TRICH', 'TYPHCAR', 'TYPHOID', 'VIBOTHER' ,'VIBVUL', 'CRYPT', 'LEG', 'LEPTO', 'BRU', 'CJD', 'HANTA', 'LEP', 'MPOX', 'PSTT', 'QF', 'RAB', 'TUL', 'DENGUE', 'HGE', 'HME', 'EHR', 'WNI', 'LAC', 'EEE', 'ARB', 'LYME', 'MAL', 'RMSF', 'SHIG', 'YF', 'TYPHUS', 'HFLU', 'HEPA', 'HEPC', 'MENP', 'NMEN', 'STRA', 'TSS', 'TSSS', 'FLU', 'FLUD', 'SARS', 'DIP', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') AND cs.create_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Cases Submitted for Review and Approval (BT Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.REPORT_TO_CDC <> 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Cases Submitted for Review and Approval (Foodborne Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.REPORT_TO_CDC <> 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Cases Submitted for Review and Approval (Gen. Surveillance)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.REPORT_TO_CDC <> 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Cases Submitted for Review and Approval (VPD)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.REPORT_TO_CDC <> 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Cases Submitted for Review and Approval (Zoonotic and Hepatitis)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.REPORT_TO_CDC <> 'Yes'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Cases w/ Isolation Quarantine Orders Issued
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: GCDC cases w/ isolation quarantine orders issued
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('ANTH', 'VHF', 'PLAG', 'SMPOX', 'VAC', 'BOT', 'BOTI', 'CAMP', 'CHOLERA', 'CYCLO', 'ECOLI', 'CPERF', 'FBOTHER', 'STAPH', 'FBPOIS', 'HUS', 'LIST', 'SAL', 'TRICH', 'TYPHCAR', 'TYPHOID', 'VIBOTHER' ,'VIBVUL', 'CRYPT', 'LEG', 'LEPTO', 'BRU', 'CJD', 'HANTA', 'LEP', 'MPOX', 'PSTT', 'QF', 'RAB', 'TUL', 'DENGUE', 'HGE', 'HME', 'EHR', 'WNI', 'LAC', 'EEE', 'ARB', 'LYME', 'MAL', 'RMSF', 'SHIG', 'YF', 'TYPHUS', 'HFLU', 'HEPA', 'HEPC', 'MENP', 'NMEN', 'STRA', 'TSS', 'TSSS', 'FLU', 'FLUD', 'SARS') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND ( ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='ISOLATED_YES' ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='ISOLATED_DATE_ENDED' AND a.date_value > $TODAY$ ) OR NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='ISOLATED_DATE_ENDED' ) ) OR ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='QUARANTINED_YES' ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='QUARANTINED_DATE_ENDED' AND a.date_value > $TODAY$ ) OR NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='QUARANTINED_DATE_ENDED' ) ))))

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Contact Events that have been Closed Within the Last 14 Days.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: GCDC Contact Events that have been Closed Within the Last 14 Days.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (3,4) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('ANTH', 'VHF', 'PLAG', 'SMPOX', 'VAC', 'BOT', 'BOTI', 'CAMP', 'CHOLERA', 'CYCLO', 'ECOLI', 'CPERF', 'FBOTHER', 'STAPH', 'FBPOIS', 'HUS', 'LIST', 'SAL', 'TRICH', 'TYPHCAR', 'TYPHOID', 'VIBOTHER' ,'VIBVUL', 'CRYPT', 'LEG', 'LEPTO', 'BRU', 'CJD', 'HANTA', 'LEP', 'MPOX', 'PSTT', 'QF', 'RAB', 'TUL', 'DENGUE', 'HGE', 'HME', 'EHR', 'WNI', 'LAC', 'EEE', 'ARB', 'LYME', 'MAL', 'RMSF', 'SHIG', 'YF', 'TYPHUS', 'HFLU', 'HEPA', 'HEPC', 'MENP', 'NMEN', 'STRA', 'TSS', 'TSSS', 'FLU', 'FLUD', 'SARS') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'DISEASE_STATUS_CONTACT' ) AND cs.modification_date >= $TODAY-14$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Inactive Cases - Attention Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: GCDC Inactive Cases - Attention Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND product.CODE IN ('ANTH', 'VHF', 'PLAG', 'SMPOX', 'VAC', 'BOT', 'BOTI', 'CAMP', 'CHOLERA', 'CYCLO', 'ECOLI', 'CPERF', 'FBOTHER', 'STAPH', 'FBPOIS', 'HUS', 'LIST', 'SAL', 'TRICH', 'TYPHCAR', 'TYPHOID', 'VIBOTHER' ,'VIBVUL', 'CRYPT', 'LEG', 'LEPTO', 'BRU', 'CJD', 'HANTA', 'LEP', 'MPOX', 'PSTT', 'QF', 'RAB', 'TUL', 'DENGUE', 'HGE', 'HME', 'EHR', 'WNI', 'LAC', 'EEE', 'ARB', 'LYME', 'MAL', 'RMSF', 'SHIG', 'YF', 'TYPHUS', 'HFLU', 'HEPA', 'HEPC', 'MENP', 'NMEN', 'STRA', 'TSS', 'TSSS', 'FLU', 'FLUD', 'SARS') AND cs.modification_date < $TODAY-7$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Urgent Review Needed (Foodborne)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: GCDC cases requiring urgent review. (Foodborne)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('BOT','BOTI','CHOLERA','TYPHCAR','TYPHOID','VIBOTHER','VIBVUL' ) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND DATEDIFF(minute, cs.MODIFICATION_DATE, cs.CREATE_DATE) < 5

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Urgent Review Needed (General and BT Related Events)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: GCDC cases requiring urgent review. (General and BT Related Events)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('ANTH','BRU','HFLU','VHF','HEPA','NMEN','PLAG','QF','SARS','SMPOX','TUL') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND DATEDIFF(minute, cs.MODIFICATION_DATE, cs.CREATE_DATE) < 5

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Urgent Review Needed (Hepatitis B)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: GCDC cases requiring urgent review. (Hepatitis B)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('HEPB_A','HEPB_C','HEPB_P','HEPB_U') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND DATEDIFF(minute, cs.MODIFICATION_DATE, cs.CREATE_DATE) < 5

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GCDC Urgent Review Needed (Zoonosis)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: GCDC cases requiring urgent review. (Zoonosis)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('MPOX','RAB') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND DATEDIFF(minute, cs.MODIFICATION_DATE, cs.CREATE_DATE) < 5

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GS and VPD Cases 2020+
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All Areas / Open Cases / Manual Entry and ELR / 2020+
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Status=0 AND Case.CreateDate >= '01/01/2020'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: GS and VPD Cases 2020+ (1)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All Areas / Open Cases / Manual Entry and ELR / 2020+
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Status=0 AND Case.CreateDate >= '01/01/2020'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: General Surveillance Batch Close
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Batch Close GS Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.CONFIRMATION_METHOD = NULL AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '10' AND Answer.MMWR_WEEK < '27' AND Answer.REPORT_TO_CDC = 'Yes'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Question.CONFIRMATION_METHOD=16488004; Case.Question.REPORT_TO_CDC=NO; Case.Status=4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV Refugees and Immigrant Follow Up Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV Refugees and Immigrant Follow Up Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('HIV') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='RISK_HISTORY' AND a.question_id IN ('IMMIGRATION_STATUS_REFUGEE', 'IMMIGRATION_STATUS_RECENT_IMMIGRANT') ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='FIELD_INVESTIGATION' AND a.question_id='PATIENT_INTERVIEWED_YES' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Interviewed and Not Closed in 30 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Interviewed and Not Closed in 30 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'HIV', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.create_date < $TODAY-30$ AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='RISK_HISTORY' AND a.question_id = 'PATIENT_INTERVIEWED_YES' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Not Interviewed in 14 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Not Interviewed in 14 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product, IDS_QUESTIONSET q, IDS_ANSWER a WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'HIV', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='FIELD_INVESTIGATION' AND a.question_id = 'PATIENT_INTERVIEWED_YES' ) AND cs.unid = q.case_id AND q.unid = a.questionset_id AND q.questionset_id = 'ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'REPORTING_SOURCE_DATE_SUBMITTED' AND a.date_value <= $TODAY-14$ AND a.date_value > $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Not Interviewed in 30 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Not Interviewed in 30 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product, IDS_QUESTIONSET q, IDS_ANSWER a WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'HIV', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id = q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='FIELD_INVESTIGATION' AND a.question_id = 'PATIENT_INTERVIEWED_YES' ) AND cs.unid = q.case_id AND q.unid = a.questionset_id AND q.questionset_id = 'ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'REPORTING_SOURCE_DATE_SUBMITTED' AND a.date_value <= $TODAY-30$ AND a.date_value > $TODAY-45$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Not Interviewed in 45 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Not Interviewed in 45 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product, IDS_QUESTIONSET q, IDS_ANSWER a WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'HIV', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='FIELD_INVESTIGATION' AND a.question_id = 'PATIENT_INTERVIEWED_YES' ) AND cs.unid = q.case_id AND q.unid = a.questionset_id AND q.questionset_id = 'ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'REPORTING_SOURCE_DATE_SUBMITTED' AND a.date_value >= $TODAY-45$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Not Interviewed in 7 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Not Interviewed in 7 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product, IDS_QUESTIONSET q, IDS_ANSWER a WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'HIV', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='FIELD_INVESTIGATION' AND a.question_id = 'PATIENT_INTERVIEWED_YES' ) AND cs.unid = q.case_id AND q.unid = a.questionset_id AND q.questionset_id = 'ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'REPORTING_SOURCE_DATE_SUBMITTED' AND a.date_value <= $TODAY-7$ AND a.date_value > $TODAY-14$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Cases Submitted for Review and Approval
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'HIV', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' AND a.VALUE IN (${CURRENT_USER_GROUPS}) AND a.iteration = ( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a1.unid FROM ids_answer a1, ids_questionset q WHERE a1.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a1.question_id = 'ASSIGN_REVIEW_STATUS_YES' AND a1.iteration = ( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Inactive Cases - Attention Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/AIDS & Syphilis Inactive Cases - Attention Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'CHANCROID', 'CHLAMYDIA', 'GONOR', 'GRANUL', 'HIV', 'LGRANUL', 'NGURETH', 'OPTHNEO', 'PID', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.modification_date < $TODAY-7$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS - CDC Reportable Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Mark the checkbox for those cases ready to report to CDC and click the "Report to CDC" button
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.CODE IN ('HIV', 'AIDS') AND cs.unid IN (SELECT COALESCE(q.case_id, q.case_id) FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id = q.unid AND q.questionset_id = 'ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'REPORT_TO_CDC_YES') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT attr.unid FROM ids_case_attribute attr WHERE attr.name = 'cdc.report.pending' AND attr.case_id = cs.unid)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS Cases With Open TB Events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/AIDS Cases With Open TB Events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PARTICIPANT pp, IDS_PARTY p, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND pp.CASE_ID = cs.UNID AND pp.PARTY_ID = p.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('HIV', 'AIDS') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT cs2.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs2, IDS_PARTICIPANT pp2, IDS_PRODUCT product2 WHERE cs2.PRODUCT_ID = product2.UNID AND pp2.CASE_ID = cs2.UNID AND pp2.PARTY_ID = p.UNID AND product2.CODE IN ('TB_ACTIVE', 'TB_LTBI') AND cs2.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs2.TYPE < 10 )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/AIDS Spousal Notification Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/AIDS Spousal Notification Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('HIV', 'AIDS') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DEMOGRAPHIC' AND a.question_id = 'MARITAL_STATUS_MARRIED' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='RISK_HISTORY' AND a.question_id = 'RISK_LEVEL_HIGH' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/STD Cases Not Closed in 30 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/STD Cases Not Closed in 30 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'CHANCROID', 'CHLAMYDIA', 'GONOR', 'GRANUL', 'HIV', 'LGRANUL', 'NGURETH', 'OPTHNEO', 'PID', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.create_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIV/STD Contact Events that have been Closed Within the Last 14 Days.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HIV/STD Contact Events that have been Closed Within the Last 14 Days.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (3,4) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('AIDS', 'CHANCROID', 'CHLAMYDIA', 'GONOR', 'GRANUL', 'HIV', 'LGRANUL', 'NGURETH', 'OPTHNEO', 'PID', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'DISEASE_STATUS_CONTACT' ) AND cs.modification_date >= $TODAY-14$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- Intakes, case open over 90 days since intake
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.HIVSL_INTAKE_SCHED_OPTIONS.Value='INTAKE_COMPLETE' AND Question.HIVSL_INTAKE_GREATER_90_CURRENT.Value='YES'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- Needs Program Assignment
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Response to "Case assigned to which program" is "N/A case not assigned"
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.ASSIGN_HIVSL_PROGRAM.Value='NA' AND Question.HIVSL_INTAKE_SCHED_OPTIONS.Value='INTAKE_COMPLETE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- Not Eligible for SL Program
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Eligible case referrals to be sent to SL Program Manager

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- SI to SL Program (All cases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All eligible case referrals to be sent to SL Program Manager

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- SI to SL Program (D2C, HHD contract, prev positive, provider)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: D2C list, HHD contractor, previous positive lab, provider - Eligible case referrals to be sent to SL Program Manager
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.HIVSL_CASE_ASSIGNED.Value='YES' AND (Question.HIVSL_REFERALL_SOURCE.Value='D2C_LIST','HHD_CONTRACTOR','PREVPOSITIVE','PROVIDER')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- SI to SL Program (DIS/HealthTrak, MMP, self-referral, re-entry)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: DIS/HealthTrak, MMP, self-referral, re-entry - Eligible case referrals to be sent to SL Program Manager
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.HIVSL_CASE_ASSIGNED.Value='YES' AND (Question.HIVSL_REFERALL_SOURCE.Value='DIS','MMP','SELF_REFERRAL','REENTRY')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- SI to SL Program (OOJ/Cluster)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: DSHS/Insurance/OOJ (incoming)/Cluster list - Eligible case referrals to be sent to SL Program Manager
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.HIVSL_CASE_ASSIGNED.Value='YES' AND (Question.HIVSL_REFERALL_SOURCE.Value='CLUSTER','DSHS','OOJ')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- SI to SL Program - Intake COMPLETED, case open
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Eligible case referrals in which intake HAS been completed and case remains open
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.HIVSL_CASE_ASSIGNED.Value='YES' AND Question.HIVSL_INTAKE_SCHED_OPTIONS.Value='INTAKE_COMPLETE'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- SI to SL Program - Intake NOT done, case open
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Eligible case referrals in which intake has NOT been completed and case remains open
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.HIVSL_CASE_ASSIGNED.Value='YES' AND Question.HIVSL_INTAKE_SCHED_OPTIONS.Value !='INTAKE_COMPLETE'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status =4

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- SL Program- Encounters- Missing SLW signature
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All eligible case referrals to be sent to SL Program Manager

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HIVSL- SL Program- Encounters- PAST 7 DAYS
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Last encounter occurred 7+ days

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Hep B Referrals
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Hep B case that are women ages 13-45
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.REPORTING_METHOD = 'Electronic lab report (ELR)' AND Answer.NAME_OF_CASE_MANAGER = NULL AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'Yes' AND Answer.AGE_YEARS > 12 AND Answer.AGE_YEARS < 46 AND Answer.GENDER = 'Female'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HepB monitor cases (Area A)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB untouched cases team A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HepB untouched cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB untouched cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Question.EVENT_DATE.Value<ComputeDate(${CURRENT_DATE},-1) AND (Party.Gender=0 AND Question.AGE.Value>=2) OR (Party.Gender=1 AND Question.AGE.Value>2 AND Question.AGE.Value<=13 AND Question.AGE.Value>55) AND Case.CreateDate >= '12/01/2019' AND Question.ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP.Value=NULL

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HepB untouched cases (Area A)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB untouched cases

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HepB untouched cases (Area B)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB untouched cases

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: HepB untouched cases (Area C)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB untouched cases

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Hepatitis C - Acute
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Hepatitis C Acute Cases

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Hepatitis C - Acute- Positive
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Hepatitis C Acute Positive Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Product.Code=HEPC_C AND Investigation.Test.Result='10828004','11214006'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Hepatitis C - Chronic
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Hepatitis C Chronic Cases

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Hepatitis C - Chronic - Positive
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Hepatitis C Chronic Positive Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Product.Code=HEPC_C AND Investigation.Test.Result='10828004','11214006'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Hepatitis Co-Morbidity
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Hepatitis Co-Morbidity
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PARTICIPANT pp, IDS_PARTY p, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND pp.CASE_ID = cs.UNID AND pp.PARTY_ID = p.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('HEPA', 'HEPC', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'HEPB_U') AND cs.STATUS IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT cs2.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs2, IDS_PARTICIPANT pp2, IDS_PRODUCT product2 WHERE cs2.PRODUCT_ID = product2.UNID AND pp2.CASE_ID = cs2.UNID AND pp2.PARTY_ID = p.UNID AND product2.CODE IN ('HEPA', 'HEPC', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'HEPB_U') AND cs2.STATUS IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs2.TYPE < 10 AND cs2.UNID <> cs.UNID )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Hepatitis Co-Morbitity
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Hepatitis Co-Morbitity
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PARTICIPANT pp, IDS_PARTY p, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND pp.CASE_ID = cs.UNID AND pp.PARTY_ID = p.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('HEPA', 'HEPC', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'HEPB_U') AND cs.STATUS IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT cs2.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs2, IDS_PARTICIPANT pp2, IDS_PRODUCT product2 WHERE cs2.PRODUCT_ID = product2.UNID AND pp2.CASE_ID = cs2.UNID AND pp2.PARTY_ID = p.UNID AND product2.CODE IN ('HEPA', 'HEPC', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'HEPB_U') AND cs2.STATUS IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs2.TYPE < 10 AND cs2.UNID <> cs.UNID )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: High Priority GCDC Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: High Priority GCDC Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('ANTH', 'VHF', 'PLAG', 'SMPOX', 'VAC', 'BOT', 'BOTI', 'CAMP', 'CHOLERA', 'CYCLO', 'ECOLI', 'CPERF', 'FBOTHER', 'STAPH', 'FBPOIS', 'HUS', 'LIST', 'SAL', 'TRICH', 'TYPHCAR', 'TYPHOID', 'VIBOTHER' ,'VIBVUL', 'CRYPT', 'LEG', 'LEPTO', 'BRU', 'CJD', 'HANTA', 'LEP', 'MPOX', 'PSTT', 'QF', 'RAB', 'TUL', 'DENGUE', 'HGE', 'HME', 'EHR', 'WNI', 'LAC', 'EEE', 'ARB', 'LYME', 'MAL', 'RMSF', 'SHIG', 'YF', 'TYPHUS', 'HFLU', 'HEPA', 'HEPC', 'MENP', 'NMEN', 'STRA', 'TSS', 'TSSS', 'FLU', 'FLUD', 'SARS') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'PRIORITY_LEVEL_HIGH' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: High Priority HIV/STD Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: High Priority HIV/STD Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('AIDS', 'CHANCROID', 'CHLAMYDIA', 'GONOR', 'GRANUL', 'HIV', 'LGRANUL', 'NGURETH', 'OPTHNEO', 'PID', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'PRIORITY_LEVEL_HIGH' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: High Priority Open Cases_MMWR18 Onwards
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Number of High Priority Cases that are still open from MMWR18 onward
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '18' AND (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'P - Pending investigation' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'T- Transmitted to DSHS' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = NULL)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: High Priority VPD Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: High Priority VPD Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('DIP', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P','HEPB_U', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'PRIORITY_LEVEL_HIGH' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: High Risk GCDC Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: High Risk GCDC Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('ANTH', 'VHF', 'PLAG', 'SMPOX', 'VAC', 'BOT', 'BOTI', 'CAMP', 'CHOLERA', 'CYCLO', 'ECOLI', 'CPERF', 'FBOTHER', 'STAPH', 'FBPOIS', 'HUS', 'LIST', 'SAL', 'TRICH', 'TYPHCAR', 'TYPHOID', 'VIBOTHER' ,'VIBVUL', 'CRYPT', 'LEG', 'LEPTO', 'BRU', 'CJD', 'HANTA', 'LEP', 'MPOX', 'PSTT', 'QF', 'RAB', 'TUL', 'DENGUE', 'HGE', 'HME', 'EHR', 'WNI', 'LAC', 'EEE', 'ARB', 'LYME', 'MAL', 'RMSF', 'SHIG', 'YF', 'TYPHUS', 'HFLU', 'HEPA', 'HEPC', 'MENP', 'NMEN', 'STRA', 'TSS', 'TSSS', 'FLU', 'FLUD', 'SARS') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='RISK_HISTORY' AND a.question_id = 'RISK_LEVEL_HIGH' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: High Risk HIV/AIDS Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: High Risk HIV/AIDS Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('AIDS', 'HIV') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='RISK_HISTORY' AND a.question_id = 'RISK_LEVEL_HIGH' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: High Risk Syphilis Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: High Risk Syphilis Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='RISK_HISTORY' AND a.question_id = 'RISK_LEVEL_HIGH' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: High Risk VPD Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: High Risk VPD Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('DIP', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='RISK_HISTORY' AND a.question_id = 'RISK_LEVEL_HIGH' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Immunization Follow-up Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Immunization Follow-up Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='VACCINES' AND a.question_id = 'VACCINATED_YES' ) AND ( ( product.CODE IN ('HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DEMOGRAPHIC' AND a.question_id = 'AGE_YEARS' AND a.numeric_value <= 1.25 ) ) OR ( product.CODE IN ('DIP', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Imran (#03b Wes copy)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] JOIN [IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT] eo on c.[UNID] = eo.CASE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE = 'WUHAN_NCOV' group by c.[UNID] HAVING 1=1 AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_LabResult' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'POSITIVE' AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_PyGeocoder_Jur' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'Houston'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Imran test (Wes 3b)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] JOIN [IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT] eo on c.[UNID] = eo.CASE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE = 'WUHAN_NCOV' group by c.[UNID] HAVING 1=1 AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_LabResult' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'POSITIVE' AND max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'External_Geocoder_Jur' then eo.[VALUE] end) = 'Houston'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Infant HEP B Contact Cases Not Closed Within a Month
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Infant HEP B Contact Cases Not Closed Within a Month
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND product.CODE IN ('HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.create_date < $TODAY-30$ AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DEMOGRAPHIC' AND a.question_id = 'AGE_YEARS' AND a.numeric_value <= 1.25 ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT lc.unid FROM IDS_CASE_LINK link, IDS_CASE lc, IDS_PRODUCT p2 WHERE link.target_case_id = cs.unid AND link.source_case_id=lc.unid AND link.type = 21 AND lc.product_id=p2.unid AND p2.CODE IN ('HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P') )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Interstate Notification Letter Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Interstate Notification Letter Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'INTERSTATE_NOTIF_SENT_YES' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DEMOGRAPHIC' AND a.question_id = 'STATE' AND a.value <> 'NC' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Issue with cases in Area A
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: An area A case with issue which needs DMT's support
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Product.Code=ISSUE AND Question.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA.Value=A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Issue with cases in Area B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: An area B case with issue which needs DMT support
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Product.Code=ISSUE AND Question.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA.Value=B

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Issue with cases in Area C
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: An area C case with issue which needs DMT support
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Product.Code=ISSUE AND Question.HEALTH_SERVICE_AREA.Value=C

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: LAB PFGE LOGGED
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: PFGE Logged Variable
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.PFGE_LOGGED = NULL
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.PFGE_LOGGED = ${CURRENT_DATE}

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: LAB PLUG DATE
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.PLUG_DATE = NULL
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.PLUG_DATE = ${CURRENT_DATE}

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: LHD Acknowledgement Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Acknowledge the event by updating the first group in the investigation trail [not admin trail] with the name of the owning jurisdiction
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND cs.STATUS IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND p.code <> 'TB_LTBI' AND (p.code = 'TB_ACTIVE' OR cs.CREATE_DATE >= '02/26/2008') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_ANSWER a, IDS_QUESTIONSET q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.QUESTION_ID = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP') AND NOT ( p.code = 'TB_LTBI' AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: LTBI - Next Clinic Visit Date Past Due - More than 30 days since last visit
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: This patient has not been seen in more than 30 days - close the case or record a visit
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code='TB_LTBI' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'VISIT_DATE' AND a.date_value < $TODAY-30$ AND a.iteration = (select max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'VISIT_DATE' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id = 'TREATMENT_STATUS_NO_LONGER_ON_THERAPY_COMPLETE' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: LTBI - Patient out of State- Interjurisdictional Letter must be Sent
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: LTBI - Generate Letter and Update Administrative Package
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code='TB_LTBI' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'DISEASE_STATUS_LTBI_REACTOR' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'INTERSTATE_NOTIF_SENT_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id = q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DEMOGRAPHIC' AND a.question_id = 'STATE' AND a.VALUE <> 'NC' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: LTBI Class AB Treatment Plan Evaluation Incomplete by LHD
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: LTBI Class AB Treatment Plan Evaluation Incomplete
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code='TB_LTBI' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'CLASS_AB_EVALUATION_DISPOSITION' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'CLASS_A_B_YES' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - Zoonotic - Lab result review required (local)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - Zoonotic, - Lab result review required (local)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('BRU','CJD','HANTA','LEPTO','MPOX','PSTT','QF','PLAG','TUL','ANTH') AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL_YES' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_DATE_LOCAL' AND dateadd(day, 1, a.date_value) < ( SELECT max(i.modification_date) FROM ids_investigation i, ids_participant p WHERE p.case_id=cs.unid AND i.participant_id=p.unid ) ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND ( p.code IN ('PSYPH','SSYPH','ELSYPH','USYPH','LLSYPH','LSYPH','NSYPH','CONGSYPH','HIV','AIDS') OR ( p.code = 'SYPHILIS' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED' ) ) ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_REGIONAL_YES' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_DATE_REGIONAL' AND dateadd(day, 1, a.date_value) < ( SELECT max(i.modification_date) FROM ids_investigation i, ids_participant p WHERE p.case_id=cs.unid AND i.participant_id=p.unid ) ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - LTBI - Open ELR events all negative results not yet reviewed (local)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Events Created by Negative Lab Results - Review and Apply Bulk action
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND p.code = 'TB_LTBI' AND cs.type < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='REPORTING_METHOD_ELR') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL_YES') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - LTBI - Open ELR events older than 90 days all negative results
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - LTBI - Open ELR events older than 90 days all negative results
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND p.code = 'TB_LTBI' AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='REPORTING_METHOD_ELR' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED') AND cs.effective_date < $TODAY-90$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - TB and LTBI - Lab result review required (local)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - TB and LTBI - Lab result review required (local)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('TB_ACTIVE','TB_LTBI') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL_YES' ) AND NOT ( p.code = 'TB_LTBI' AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED') AND cs.unid NOT IN ( SELECT ci.unid FROM ids_case ci INNER JOIN ids_product pi on ci.product_id = pi.unid INNER JOIN ids_participant parti on ci.unid = parti.case_id INNER JOIN ids_investigation invi on parti.unid = invi.participant_id INNER JOIN ids_investigation_result invresi on invi.unid = invresi.investigation_id INNER JOIN ids_investigation_result_attr invattr1i on invresi.unid = invattr1i.investigation_result_id INNER JOIN ids_investigation_result_attr invattr2i on invresi.unid = invattr2i.investigation_result_id WHERE pi.code LIKE 'TB_LTBI' AND invresi.result_code = 'TEST' AND invattr1i.name = 'Result' AND invattr2i.name = 'Test' AND invattr2i.value + '_' + invattr1i.value IN (SELECT reference_code FROM ids_reference_code WHERE reference_group='HL7_EVENT_LOOKUP' AND ( description LIKE 'TB_ACTIVE;CONFIRMED;%' OR description LIKE 'TB_ACTIVE;SUSPECT;%' OR description LIKE 'LEP;UNDER INVESTIGATION;%') ) ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - TB and LTBI - Lab result review required (state)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - TB and LTBI - Lab result review required (state)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('TB_ACTIVE','TB_LTBI') AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_STATE_YES' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_DATE_STATE' AND dateadd(day, 1, a.date_value) < ( SELECT max(i.modification_date) FROM ids_investigation i, ids_participant p WHERE p.case_id=cs.unid AND i.participant_id=p.unid ) ) ) AND NOT ( p.code = 'TB_LTBI' AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED') AND cs.unid NOT IN ( SELECT ci.unid FROM ids_case ci INNER JOIN ids_product pi on ci.product_id = pi.unid INNER JOIN ids_participant parti on ci.unid = parti.case_id INNER JOIN ids_investigation invi on parti.unid = invi.participant_id INNER JOIN ids_investigation_result invresi on invi.unid = invresi.investigation_id INNER JOIN ids_investigation_result_attr invattr1i on invresi.unid = invattr1i.investigation_result_id INNER JOIN ids_investigation_result_attr invattr2i on invresi.unid = invattr2i.investigation_result_id WHERE pi.code LIKE 'TB_LTBI' AND invresi.result_code = 'TEST' AND invattr1i.name = 'Result' AND invattr2i.name = 'Test' AND invattr2i.value + '_' + invattr1i.value IN (SELECT reference_code FROM ids_reference_code WHERE reference_group='HL7_EVENT_LOOKUP' AND ( description LIKE 'TB_ACTIVE;CONFIRMED;%' OR description LIKE 'TB_ACTIVE;SUSPECT;%' OR description LIKE 'LEP;UNDER INVESTIGATION;%') ) ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - VPDs - Lab result review required (local)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - VPDs - Lab result review required (local)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - VPDs - Lab result review required (regional)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - VPDs - Lab result review required (state)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - VPDs - Lab result review required (state)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('RUB','RUBCONG','MUMPS','MEAS','DIP','TET','PERT','POL') AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_STATE_YES' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_DATE_STATE' AND dateadd(day, 1, a.date_value) < ( SELECT max(i.modification_date) FROM ids_investigation i, ids_participant p WHERE p.case_id=cs.unid AND i.participant_id=p.unid ) ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - Vectorborne - Lab result review required (local)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - Vectorborne - Lab result review required (local)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND ( p.code IN ('DENGUE','HGE','HME','EHR','EEE','LAC','ARB','WNI','MAL','RMSF','YF') OR ( p.code = 'LYME' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED' ) ) ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL_YES' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_DATE_LOCAL' AND dateadd(day, 1, a.date_value) < ( SELECT max(i.modification_date) FROM ids_investigation i, ids_participant p WHERE p.case_id=cs.unid AND i.participant_id=p.unid ) ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Lab Results - Vectorborne - Lab result review required (state)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Lab Results - Vectorborne - Lab result review required (state)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND ( p.code IN ('DENGUE','HGE','HME','EHR','EEE','LAC','ARB','WNI','MAL','RMSF','YF') OR ( p.code = 'LYME' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED' ) ) ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_STATE_YES' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='LAB_REVIEW_DATE_STATE' AND dateadd(day, 1, a.date_value) < ( SELECT max(i.modification_date) FROM ids_investigation i, ids_participant p WHERE p.case_id=cs.unid AND i.participant_id=p.unid ) ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Locate cases from Harris Health
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Locate cases from Harris Health
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '13' AND Answer.MMWR_WEEK < '24' OR (Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0491435' AND Investigation.LabFacility.CLIA='45D0494559')
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: MK Batch Assign Pending
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: MK Batch Close Outbreak Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID, cs.CREATE_DATE, cs.CASE_ID,cs.PRODUCT_ID, prd.UNID, prd.NAME FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT prd WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID=prd.UNID AND (cs.CREATE_DATE < $TODAY$ AND cs.CREATE_DATE > $TODAY-13$) AND cs.TYPE=1 AND (cs.MODEL_NAME='VPDSurveillanceModel' OR cs.MODEL_NAME='GCDCSurveillanceModel' ) order by cs.CREATE_DATE
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= P;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: MK Batch Close Outbreak
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: MK Batch Close Outbreak Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.TYPE<10 AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.TARGET_CASE_ID=( SELECT c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c WHERE c.CASE_ID=100313243 AND c.TYPE=10 ) AND l.TYPE <> 32 ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.TARGET_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=( SELECT c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c WHERE c.CASE_ID=100313243 AND c.TYPE=10 ) AND l.TYPE <> 32 ) )
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status = 4; Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION=48043;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: MK Batch Close Outbreak_AssistedLiving_Noro
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: MK Batch Close Outbreak Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.TYPE<10 AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.TARGET_CASE_ID=( SELECT c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c WHERE c.CASE_ID=100212504 AND c.TYPE=10 ) AND l.TYPE <> 32 ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT l.UNID FROM IDS_CASE_LINK l WHERE l.TARGET_CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND l.SOURCE_CASE_ID=( SELECT c.UNID FROM IDS_CASE c WHERE c.CASE_ID=100212504 AND c.TYPE=10 ) AND l.TYPE <> 32 ) )
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= R; Question.OWNING_JURISDICTION=48043; Task.Type=10; Task.Status = 2; Case.Status = 4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Mark as Cases Transmitted to DSHS without sending
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Check boxes and press 'Mark Transmitted'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status = 0; Question.DATE_TRANSMITTED_CDC = ${CURRENT_DATE}; Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = T; Case.Question.REPORT_TO_NBS=NO; Case.Status = 4

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Missing reporting county (All diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Missing reporting county
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.OWNING_JURISDICTION_HOUSTON = NULL

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: NCIR Match Resolution Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: NCIR Match Resolution Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.STATUS IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_case_attribute a WHERE a.case_id=cs.unid AND a.name='ir.status' AND a.value='MATCHPENDING' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: NCIR Vaccine Information Review Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: NCIR Vaccine Information Review Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.STATUS IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='VACCINES' AND a.question_id='VACCINE_NCIR_REVIEW_REQUIRED_YES' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: OOJ ELRs - Brazoria County
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Mark all ELRs for Brazoria CO as fowarded with current date
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'O - Out of Jurisdiction' AND Answer.OWNING_JURISDICTION = 'Brazoria CO Health Department' AND Answer.EVENT_FORWARDED = NULL AND Answer.DATE_FORWARDED = NULL AND Answer.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = 'No'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Assigned Cases Since 2014
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases assigned for investigation but with case status as Open since 2014
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Cases - All
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All Open Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.ModelName<>NULL AND Case.Type<10

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Cases - Assigned to Current User
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases assigned to current user
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND EXISTS ( SELECT t.UNID FROM IDS_TASK t WHERE t.CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND t.USER_ID=${CURRENT_USER} AND t.STATUS < 2 ) order by cs.CREATE_DATE

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Cases - Unassigned
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Unassigned Open Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT t.UNID FROM IDS_TASK t WHERE t.CASE_ID=cs.UNID ) order by cs.CREATE_DATE

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Cases Pending 10 Days or More
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases pending more than 10 days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM IDS_CASE WHERE status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND CREATE_DATE < $TODAY-10$ order by CREATE_DATE

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Cases Pending/Blank Needing Followup (KA)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open Cases Pending/Blank Needing Followup
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] AS CaseUNID FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_USER] um ON c.[MODIFIED_BY_ID] = um.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_USER] uc ON c.[CREATED_BY_ID] = uc.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTY] pty ON parp.[PARTY_ID] = pty.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_QUESTIONSET] qs ON c.[UNID] = qs.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_ANSWER] a ON qs.[UNID] = a.[QUESTIONSET_ID] WHERE 1=1 AND c.CREATE_DATE BETWEEN '01/01/2018' AND getdate()-30 AND c.MODIFICATION_DATE BETWEEN '01/01/2018' AND getdate()-30 AND c.[STATUS] IN (0) AND p.CODE IN ( 'AFM', 'AMEB', 'AMMEN', 'ANA', 'ANTH', 'ARB', 'ASCA', 'BABESIOSIS', 'BOT', 'BOTFDB', 'BOTI', 'BOTWND', 'BRU' , 'BURK', 'CAC', 'CALI', 'CAMP', 'CHAGAS', 'CHAGASCS', 'CHAGASI', 'CHIKV', 'CHIKVNN', 'CHOLERA', 'CJD', 'CPOX', 'CRE', 'CRYPT' , 'CYCLO', 'CYSTI', 'DENGUE', 'DHF', 'DIP', 'ECHINO', 'ECOLI', 'EEE', 'EHR', 'ENCNONARB', 'EVD68', 'FASC', 'FLUD', 'GRANUL' , 'HANTA', 'HEPA', 'HEPC', 'HEPD', 'HEPE', 'HFLU', 'HGE', 'HME', 'HOOK', 'HUS', 'JAM', 'JAP', 'LAC', 'LEG' , 'LEP', 'LEPTO', 'LESH', 'LGRANUL', 'LIST', 'LYME', 'MAL', 'MDRA', 'MDRO', 'MEAS', 'MENB', 'MENP', 'MERS', 'MPOX', 'MUMPS' , 'MVIR', 'NGURETH', 'NMEN', 'NNCAC', 'NNCALI', 'NNEEE', 'NNJAM', 'NNJAP', 'NNLAC', 'NNPOW', 'NNVEE', 'NNWEE', 'OPTHNEO', 'PARA' , 'PERT', 'PID', 'PLAG', 'POL', 'POW', 'PSTT', 'QF', 'QFACUTE', 'QFCHRONIC', 'RMSF', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'SAL', 'SARS' , 'SAUR', 'SHIG', 'SMPOX', 'STL', 'STLNN', 'STRA', 'STRB', 'STRSP', 'TET', 'TNIA', 'TRICH', 'TRICHU', 'TSS', 'TSSS', 'TUL', 'TYPH' , 'TYPHCAR', 'TYPHOID', 'TYPHUS', 'VAC', 'VEN', 'VHF', 'VIBOTHER', 'VIBPARA', 'VIBVUL', 'VISA', 'VRSA', 'WEE', 'WNF', 'WNI', 'WNVU' , 'YER', 'YF', 'ZIKA' ) AND ( a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' OR a.[QUESTION_ID] = 'DATE_FOR_REPORTING' ) AND c.UNID NOT IN ( SELECT t.CASE_ID FROM IDS_TASK t WHERE 1=1 AND t.status < 2 AND t.type = 1 AND CREATED_BY_ID IN (58382297, 320410598 ,267784905, 512983588) ) group by c.[UNID] HAVING MAX( case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[QUESTION_ID] End ) IS NULL OR MAX( case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[QUESTION_ID] End ) = 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS_P'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events (BT Agent)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Close the event
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = p.UNID AND p.CODE IN ('ANTH', 'VHF', 'PLAG', 'SMPOX', 'TUL', 'BOT', 'BOTI', 'SARS', 'BRU', 'HANTA', 'PSTT', 'QF', 'SAUR') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8)
