WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND EXISTS ( SELECT t.UNID FROM IDS_TASK t WHERE t.CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND t.USER_ID='255716496' AND t.STATUS < 2 )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events - Assigned to Tahini Hamdan
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Events assigned to current user
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND EXISTS ( SELECT t.UNID FROM IDS_TASK t WHERE t.CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND t.USER_ID='193796216' AND t.STATUS < 2 )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events - Assigned to ZPR Team
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open events assigned to all active/inactive team members
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND EXISTS ( SELECT t.UNID FROM IDS_TASK t WHERE t.CASE_ID=cs.UNID AND t.USER_ID IN ('265914901','193796216','275894988','255716496','379022580') AND t.STATUS <> 2 )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events With No Activities for 30 Days (Foodborne & Diarrheal Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_CASE a, IDS_PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_ID = b.UNID AND a.TYPE < 10 AND b.CODE IN ('CPERF', 'STAPH', 'FBPOIS', 'SHIG', 'CAMP','BOT','BOTI','CHOLERA','CYCLO','ECOLI','FBOTHR', 'HUS','LIST','SAL','TRICH','TYPHOID','TYPCAR','VIBVUL') AND a.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND a.modification_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events With No Activities for 30 Days (High Profile Communicable Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_CASE a, IDS_PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_ID = b.UNID AND a.TYPE < 10 AND b.CODE IN ('ANTH', 'VHF', 'PLAG', 'SMPOX', 'TUL','BOT','BOTI','HEPA','FLU','NMEN','SARS') AND a.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND a.modification_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events With No Activities for 30 Days (Other Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_CASE a, IDS_PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_ID = b.UNID AND a.TYPE < 10 AND b.CODE IN ('HFLU', 'HEPA', 'HEPC', 'MENP', 'NMEN', 'STRA', 'TSS', 'TSSS') AND a.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND a.modification_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events With No Activities for 30 Days (Respiratory Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_CASE a, IDS_PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_ID = b.UNID AND a.TYPE < 10 AND b.CODE IN ('FLU', 'FLUD', 'SARS') AND a.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND a.modification_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events With No Activities for 30 Days (VPD Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_CASE a, IDS_PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_ID = b.UNID AND a.TYPE < 10 AND b.CODE IN ('DIP', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') AND a.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND a.modification_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events With No Activities for 30 Days (Vectorborne Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_CASE a, IDS_PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_ID = b.UNID AND a.TYPE < 10 AND b.CODE IN ('DENGUE', 'HGE', 'HME', 'EHR', 'WNI', 'LAC', 'EEE', 'ARB', 'LYME', 'MAL', 'RMSF', 'YF') AND a.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND a.modification_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events With No Activities for 30 Days (Waterborne Diseases)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_CASE a, IDS_PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_ID = b.UNID AND a.TYPE < 10 AND b.CODE IN ('CRYPT', 'LEG', 'VIBOTHER') AND a.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND a.modification_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Events With No Activities for 30 Days (Zoonotic)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT a.UNID FROM IDS_CASE a, IDS_PRODUCT b WHERE a.PRODUCT_ID = b.UNID AND a.TYPE < 10 AND b.CODE IN ('BRU','CJD','HANTA','LEPTO','MPOX','PSTT','QF','PLAG','TUL','ANTH') AND a.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND a.modification_date < $TODAY-30$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Not Assigned Cases Since 2014
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases not assigned for investigation and with case status as Open since 2014
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Red Cross Shelter Surveillance
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open Red Cross Shelter Surveillance
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Status!=4 AND Case.ModificationDate >= '01/01/2015'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Open Shelter Syndrome Surveillance
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open Shelter Syndrome Surveillance
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Status!=4 AND Case.ModificationDate >= '01/01/2015'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Outbreaks with concerns
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Outbreaks with concerns
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.unid FROM ids_case cs, ids_participant p, ids_concern c WHERE cs.unid=p.case_id AND c.participant_id=p.unid AND cs.type=10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND c.status=0

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - All cases, open and closed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Perinatal Hep B

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - Hepatitis B-positive children <2 years of age
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB+ children aged <=2 years
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status = 0; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = NO; Case.Status = 4

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - Hepatitis B-positive females of childbearing age
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB+ females aged 13-55
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Party.Gender=1 AND Question.AGE.Value<=55 AND Question.AGE.Value>=13 AND Case.CreateDate >= '01/01/2018'
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Case.Status = 0; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL = NO; Case.Status = 4

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - Infants and household contacts due for 1st Hep B Dose (0-7 days)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Perinatal Hep B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.HEPB1_DATE=NULL AND Output.DAYSSINCEDOB >=0 AND (Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Saugling' OR Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Infant')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - Infants and household contacts due for 2nd Hep B Dose (2 months)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Perinatal Hep B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.HEPB1_DATE=NULL AND Output.DAYSSINCEDOB >=55 AND (Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Saugling' OR Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Infant')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - Infants and household contacts due for 3rd Hep B Dose (4 months)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Perinatal Hep B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.HEPB2_DATE=NULL AND Output.DAYSSINCEDOB >=115 AND (Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Saugling' OR Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Infant')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - Infants and household contacts due for 4th Hep B Dose (6 months)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Perinatal Hep B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.HEPB3_DATE=NULL AND Output.DAYSSINCEDOB >=235 AND (Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Saugling' OR Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Infant')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - Infants and household contacts due for PVST
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Perinatal Hep B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.HEPB1_DATE!=NULL AND Answer.HEPB2_DATE!=NULL AND Answer.HEPB3_DATE!=NULL AND Output.DAYSSINCEDOB >=270 AND POST_VACCINE_HBSAG!=NULL AND POST_VACCINE_ANTIHBS!=NULL AND (Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Saugling' OR Output.MOTHERINFANTCONTACT='Infant')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Perinatal Hep B Program - Infants and household contacts who need second vaccine series/PVST
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Perinatal Hep B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.ANTI_HBS_Q_RESULT<10 AND (Answer.ANTI_HBS_Q_RESULT2<10 OR Answer.ANTI_HBS_Q_RESULT2=NULL)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Rabies_BARC (2018)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Human Rabies from BARC

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Razina
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Mark the checkbox for those cases ready to report to DSHS and press "Mark for Extract"
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Answer.MMWR_YEAR >= '18' AND (Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'P - Pending investigation' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'T- Transmitted to DSHS' OR Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = NULL)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Reportable Cases Not Ready For Review (Chronic)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases denoted as reportable that have not meet the criteria for Team Lead Review
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '12'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Reportable Cases Not Ready For Review (Foodborne)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases denoted as reportable that have not meet the criteria for Team Lead Review
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report' AND Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '12'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Reportable Cases Not Ready For Review (General Surveillance)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases denoted as reportable that have not meet the criteria for Team Lead Review
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '12' AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Reportable Cases Not Ready For Review (VPD)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases denoted as reportable that have not meet the criteria for Team Lead Review
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Case.Type=1 AND Answer.MMWR_YEAR = '12' AND Answer.INVESTIGATION_STATUS = 'R - Ready to report'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: STD - CDC Reportable Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: STD - CDC Reportable Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.CODE IN ('CHANCROID', 'CHLAMYDIA', 'GONOR', 'GRANUL', 'LGRANUL', 'NGURETH', 'OPTHNEO', 'PID', 'PSYPH', 'SSYPH', 'ELSYPH', 'USYPH', 'LLSYPH', 'LSYPH', 'NSYPH', 'CONGSYPH', 'SYPHILIS') AND cs.unid IN (SELECT COALESCE(q.case_id, q.case_id) FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id = q.unid AND q.questionset_id = 'ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'REPORT_TO_CDC_YES') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT attr.unid FROM ids_case_attribute attr WHERE attr.name = 'cdc.report.pending' AND attr.case_id = cs.unid)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: STD Cases Submitted for Review and Approval
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('CHANCROID', 'CHLAMYDIA', 'GONOR', 'GRANUL', 'LGRANUL', 'NGURETH', 'OPTHNEO', 'PID') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' AND a.VALUE IN (${CURRENT_USER_GROUPS}) AND a.iteration = ( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a1.unid FROM ids_answer a1, ids_questionset q WHERE a1.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a1.question_id = 'ASSIGN_REVIEW_STATUS_YES' AND a1.iteration = ( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Shared Cases - Cases shared by me
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases shared by me

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Shared Cases - Cases shared with me or my group(s)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases shared with me or my group(s)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT DISTINCT sc.CASE_ID FROM IDS_SHARED_CASE sc WHERE sc.USER_ID=${CURRENT_USER} OR sc.USERGROUP_ID IN (${CURRENT_USER_GROUPS})

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Specimen collection for Serology performed too early
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Specimen collection for Serology performed too early
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('MEAS', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CDC_REQUIRED' AND a.question_id = 'CDC_MUMP_MEASLES_IGM_TEST_RESULT_NEGATIVE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT rash.unid FROM ( SELECT c.date_value, cs.unid FROM ids_questionset b, ids_answer c WHERE cs.unid = b.case_id AND b.unid = c.questionset_id AND c.question_id = 'SS_SKIN_RASH_ONSET_DATE') rash, ( SELECT d.date_value, cs.unid FROM ids_questionset b, ids_answer d WHERE cs.unid = b.case_id AND b.unid = d.questionset_id AND d.question_id = 'CDC_MUMP_MEASLES_SPEC_COLLECT_DATE' ) test WHERE test.unid = rash.unid AND DATEDIFF(Day,test.date_value,rash.date_value) < 4 )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - All Open Active TB Events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB - All open active TB events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.unid FROM ids_case cs, ids_product p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - CDC Reportable Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB - CDC Reportable Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='CDC_COUNT_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='REPORT_TO_CDC_YES') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT attr.unid FROM ids_case_attribute attr WHERE attr.name='cdc.report.pending' AND attr.case_id=cs.unid)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Cases moved to another state and treatment incomplete
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Moved to Another State and Treatment Not Complete
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND (a.question_id = 'TREATMENT_STATUS_STILL_ON_THERAPY' OR a.question_id = 'PATIENT_NO_LONGER_ON_THERAPY_INCOMPLETE_MOVED' OR a.question_id = 'TREATMENT_STATUS_NO_LONGER_ON_THERAPY_INCOMPLETE') ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DEMOGRAPHIC' AND a.question_id = 'STATE' AND a.value <> 'NC' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id = 'TREATMENT_REGIMEN_START_DATE' AND a.date_value < $TODAY-180$ )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Class A/B w/o clinic visit
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Class A/B patient without a clinic visit - close or record visit
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'VISIT_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND (a.question_id = 'CLASS_A_B_B1' OR a.question_id = 'CLASS_A_B_B2' OR a.question_id = 'CLASS_A_B_A') )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Class A/B w/o printed CDC form
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Form has not been sent to CDC - Update date sent to CDC in Admin package
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'VISIT_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'CDC_FORM_7517_FROM_LBOH_RECEIVED_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND (a.question_id = 'CLASS_A_B_B1' OR a.question_id = 'CLASS_A_B_B2' OR a.question_id = 'CLASS_A_B_A') ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'CDC_SENT_FORM_7517_DATE' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Contacts who are TST positive or high risk w/out clinic visit date
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Contacts who are TST positive or high risk w/out clinic visit date
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_LTBI' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_CONTACT' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id IN ('CLINICAL', 'DEMOGRAPHIC', 'RISK_HISTORY') AND a.question_id IN ('TST_RESULT_POSITIVE', 'AGE_YEARS', 'INITIAL_HIV_STATUS_POSITIVE') ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='VISIT_DATE' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Contacts who need a TST
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB - Contacts who need a TST
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_LTBI' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_CONTACT' ) AND ( NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='TST_PLANT_DATE' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='PREVIOUS_TST_TEST_YES' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - DOT mandatory, but case not on DOT
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB - DOT mandatory, but case not on DOT
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DOT_OUTREACH' AND a.question_id='PUT_ON_DIRECTLY_OBSERVED_THERAPY_YES' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DOT_OUTREACH' AND a.question_id='DOT_DATE_OBSERVED' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Next clinic visit date is past due- More than 30 Days Since Last Visit
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Next clinic visit date is past due (for primary)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='VISIT_DATE' AND a.date_value < $TODAY-30$ AND a.iteration=( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id='VISIT_DATE' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id='TREATMENT_STATUS_NO_LONGER_ON_THERAPY_COMPLETE' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Open Events Inactive 10 Days or More
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Update the event or close it
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND p.code = 'TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.MODIFICATION_DATE < $TODAY-10$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Patient out of State- Interjurisdictional Letter must be Sent
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB - Sent Interjurisdictional Letter and Update Admin Package
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='INTERSTATE_NOTIF_SENT_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DEMOGRAPHIC' AND a.question_id='STATE' AND NOT a.VALUE='NC' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - RVCT - Follow Up Two is Due in Two Weeks or Less
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Indicate if Patient is on Prolonged Therapy or Enter the Date Treatment Ended
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='FOLLOW_UP_TWO_APPROVE_YES' ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id='TREATMENT_REGIMEN_START_DATE' AND a.date_value <= $TODAY-168$ ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id='PROLONGED_THERAPY_INDICATED_YES' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id='TREATMENT_REGIMEN_STOP_DATE' ) ) UNION SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='FOLLOW_UP_TWO_APPROVE_YES' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id='TREATMENT_REGIMEN_START_DATE' AND a.date_value <= $TODAY-168$ ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id='TREATMENT_REGIMEN_STOP_DATE' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - RVCT Follow-up One due in two weeks or less
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Follow-up One with Susceptibilites is due in the same time frame as the RVCT
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='FOLLOW_UP_ONE_APPROVE_YES') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='REPORTED_TO_CDC_NOT_NC_YES') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id='TREATMENT_REGIMEN_START_DATE' AND a.date_value <= $TODAY-70$ )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - RVCT is Due in Two Weeks or Less
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: RVCT is Due 14 weeks after medication start date -
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='CRF_REVIEW_OUTCOME_APPROVED' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='REPORTED_TO_CDC_NOT_NC_YES') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='MEDICATION' AND a.question_id='TREATMENT_REGIMEN_START_DATE' AND a.date_value <= $TODAY-70$ )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB - Reporting Tool is Due in 7 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Reporting Tool Due in 7 Days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='REPORTING_TOOL_APPROVED_YES')

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB Cases Submitted for Review and Approval
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('TB_ACTIVE', 'TB_LTBI') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' AND a.VALUE IN (${CURRENT_USER_GROUPS}) AND a.iteration = ( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a1.unid FROM ids_answer a1, ids_questionset q WHERE a1.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a1.question_id = 'ASSIGN_REVIEW_STATUS_YES' AND a1.iteration = ( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB Cases With Open HIV/AIDS Events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB Cases With Open HIV/AIDS Events
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PARTICIPANT pp, IDS_PARTY p, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND pp.CASE_ID = cs.UNID AND pp.PARTY_ID = p.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('TB_ACTIVE', 'TB_LTBI') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT cs2.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs2, IDS_PARTICIPANT pp2, IDS_PRODUCT product2 WHERE cs2.PRODUCT_ID = product2.UNID AND pp2.CASE_ID = cs2.UNID AND pp2.PARTY_ID = p.UNID AND product2.CODE IN ('HIV', 'AIDS') AND cs2.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs2.TYPE < 10 )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB Cases w/ Isolation Quarantine Orders Issued
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB cases w/ isolation quarantine orders issued
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('TB_ACTIVE') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='ISOLATED_YES' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='ISOLATED_DATE_ENDED' AND (a.date_value > $TODAY$ OR a.date_value IS null) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB Class AB Treatment Plan Evaluation Incomplete
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB Class AB Treatment Plan Evaluation Incomplete
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code='TB_ACTIVE' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='CLASS_AB_EVALUATION_DISPOSITION' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='CLASS_A_B_YES' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB LTBI - Contacts who are TST positive or high risk w/out clinic visit date
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Contacts who are TST positive or high risk w/out clinic visit date
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('TB_LTBI') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'DISEASE_STATUS_CONTACT' ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'TST_RESULT_POSITIVE' ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='DEMOGRAPHIC' AND a.question_id = 'AGE_YEARS' AND a.NUMERIC_VALUE < 5 ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='RISK_HISTORY' AND a.question_id = 'INITIAL_HIV_STATUS_POSITIVE' ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'VISIT_DATE' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB and LTBI - Class A/B w/o clinic visit
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB/LTBI - Class A/B w/o clinic visit
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code IN ('TB_ACTIVE','TB_LTBI') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='VISIT_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND (a.question_id='CLASS_A_B_YES') )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB and LTBI - Open events that do not meet Disease Criteria
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB - Open events that do not meet Disease Criteria
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id=p.unid AND p.code IN ('TB_ACTIVE','TB_LTBI') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='DISEASE_STATUS_DOES_NOT_MEET_CRITERIA' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB/LTBI - Contacts who need a TST
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: TB/LTBI - Contacts who need a TST
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code='TB_LTBI' AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'DISEASE_STATUS_CONTACT' ) AND ( NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'TST_PLANT_DATE' ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id = 'PREVIOUS_TST_TEST_YES' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB/LTBI - Open Events with Status Revoked
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open events that do not meet case definition
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('TB_ACTIVE','TB_LTBI') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'DISEASE_STATUS_DOES_NOT_MEET_CRITERIA' )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: TB/LTBI Class A/B 75.17 information not sent to State Registrar
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: State did not get form from LHD yet
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT p WHERE cs.product_id = p.unid AND p.code IN ('TB_ACTIVE', 'TB_LTBI') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='VISIT_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id='CDC_FORM_7517_FROM_LBOH_RECEIVED_DATE' ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND (a.question_id = 'CLASS_A_B_YES'))

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Team Open <= 14 days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.UNID AS Case_UNID ,c.EXTERNAL_ID AS Event_ID ,c.STATUS AS CaseStatus ,cast(max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_1st_PcrPos_SpecDate' then eo.[VALUE] end) AS date) AS PcrDate ,max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_PyGeocoder_Jur' then eo.[VALUE] end) AS Jur ,max(tk.UNID) AS max_Task_UNID ,tk.STATUS AS TaskStatus ,ug.NAME FROM IDS_CASE c LEFT JOIN IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT eo on c.UNID = eo.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_TASK tk on c.UNID= tk.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_USERGROUP ug on tk.USERGROUP_ID = ug.UNID WHERE 1=1 AND ug.NAME = ' COVID' AND (c.STATUS = 0 OR tk.STATUS IN (0,1,3)) group by c.UNID, c.EXTERNAL_ID, c.STATUS,tk.STATUS, ug.NAME HAVING cast(max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_1st_PcrPos_SpecDate' then eo.[VALUE] end) AS date) BETWEEN dateadd(day,-14, cast(getdate() AS date)) AND cast(getdate() AS date)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Team 01 Open <= 14 days
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.UNID AS Case_UNID ,c.EXTERNAL_ID AS Event_ID ,c.STATUS AS CaseStatus ,cast(max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_1st_PcrPos_SpecDate' then eo.[VALUE] end) AS date) AS PcrDate ,max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_PyGeocoder_Jur' then eo.[VALUE] end) AS Jur ,max(tk.UNID) AS max_Task_UNID ,tk.STATUS AS TaskStatus ,ug.NAME FROM IDS_CASE c LEFT JOIN IDS_EXECUTION_OUTPUT eo on c.UNID = eo.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_TASK tk on c.UNID= tk.CASE_ID JOIN IDS_USERGROUP ug on tk.USERGROUP_ID = ug.UNID WHERE 1=1 AND ug.NAME = '1 COVID' AND (c.STATUS = 0 OR tk.STATUS IN (0,1,3)) group by c.UNID, c.EXTERNAL_ID, c.STATUS,tk.STATUS, ug.NAME HAVING cast(max(case when eo.VARIABLE = 'COVID_19_1st_PcrPos_SpecDate' then eo.[VALUE] end) AS date) BETWEEN dateadd(day,-14, cast(getdate() AS date)) AND cast(getdate() AS date)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Team 01 Open > 14 days

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Unfinished Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Events Where Task Is Complete But Case Is Still Open
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs LEFT JOIN IDS_PRODUCT pr on cs.PRODUCT_ID = pr.UNID LEFT JOIN IDS_TASK t on cs.UNID = t.CASE_ID WHERE 1=1 AND cs.CREATE_DATE >= '012/01/2017' AND pr.CODE NOT IN ('HEPB_C','HEPC_C','HEPB_U') AND cs.status = 0 AND pr.PREFERRED_MODEL IN ('GCDCSurveillanceModel','VPDSurveillanceModel') AND t.TYPE = 0 AND group by cs.UNID HAVING min(t.STATUS) = 2

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Unknown COVID (+) with LOINCS and SNOMED
Unkown negative Test Results)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE = 'UNKNOWN' AND inv.UNID IS NOT NULL AND c.[UNID] NOT IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p on c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp on c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv on parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir on inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira on ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND p.CODE = 'UNKNOWN' group by c.[UNID] HAVING max(case when ira.[NAME] = 'Result' AND ira.VALUE IN ('10828004','260373001','961') then 'POSITIVE' end) = 'POSITIVE' ) group by c.[UNID]

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Unresolved High Priority Cases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: All Open, Pending, High Priority Cases With Positive Test Results since 2018
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM ( SELECT ti1.*, trc.DESCRIPTION FROM ( SELECT c.[CASE_ID] AS Event_ID ,c.[UNID] ,c.CREATE_DATE AS CaseCreateDate ,parp.[PARTY_ID] AS PARTY_ID , pty.UNID AS PartyUNID ,pty.[EXTERNAL_ID] AS PARTY_EXTERNAL_ID ,pty.[FULL_NAME] AS FULL_NAME ,pty.[BIRTH_DATE] AS [BIRTH_DATE] ,p.[NAME] AS Condition ,p.[DESCRIPTION] AS ConditionDescription ,case when c.[STATUS] = 0 then 'Open' when c.[STATUS] = 3 then 'Manually Closed' when c.[STATUS] = 4 then 'Batch Closed' when c.[STATUS] = 6 then 'Invalid' end AS CaseStatus ,case when c.[TYPE] = 0 then 'Manual entry' when c.[TYPE] = 1 then 'Feed' end AS CaseType ,p.[PREFERRED_MODEL] AS Model ,'Investigation' AS TableType ,inv.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_UNID ,inv.[TYPE] AS INVESTIG_TYPE ,inv.[TEMPLATE] AS INVESTIG_TEMPLATE ,inv.[EXTERNAL_ID] AS INVESTIG_EXTERNAL_ID ,ir.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_RES_UNID ,CONVERT(nvarchar(30), ir.[RESULT_Date] , 101) AS QuestionResultDate ,ira.[UNID] AS INVESTIG_RES_ATTR_UNID ,ir.[RESULT_CODE] AS QuestionType ,ira.[NAME] AS Question ,ira.[VALUE] AS Value FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_USER] um ON c.[MODIFIED_BY_ID] = um.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_USER] uc ON c.[CREATED_BY_ID] = uc.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTICIPANT] parp ON c.[UNID] = parp.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_PARTY] pty ON parp.[PARTY_ID] = pty.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION] inv ON parp.[UNID] = inv.PARTICIPANT_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT] ir ON inv.[UNID] = ir.INVESTIGATION_ID LEFT JOIN [IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR] ira ON ir.[UNID] = ira.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID WHERE p.CODE IN ('AFM', 'ANTH' ,'ARB','BOT' ,'BOTFDB' ,'BOTI' ,'BOTWND' ,'BRU' ,'CAC' ,'CALI' ,'CHAGAS' ,'CHAGASCS' ,'CHAGASI' ,'CHOLERA' ,'CJD' ,'CYCLO' ,'DHF' ,'DIP' ,'ECOLI' ,'FBPOIS' ,'SCAB' ,'ENCNONARB' ,'EVD68','FLUD' ,'FLUH1N1' ,'HANTA' ,'HEPA' ,'CPOX','HFLU' ,'HUS' ,'JAM' ,'JAP' ,'LAC' ,'LEG' ,'LESH' ,'MAL' ,'MEAS' ,'MENB' ,'MERS' ,'MUMPS' ,'NMEN' ,'NORO','PERT' ,'PUM','PFGE','PLAG' ,'POL' ,'POW' ,'QF' ,'QFACUTE' ,'RAB','RSV','EEE','STL','VEN','TSSS','RUB' ,'RUBCONG' ,'SARS' ,'SMPOX' ,'TUO','TET','TOXIN' ,'TUL' ,'TYPHOID' ,'VHF' ,'VISA' ,'VRSA' ,'WEE' ,'WNF' ,'WNI' ,'WNVU' ,'YER' ,'YF' ,'ZIKA' ) AND c.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2017' AND ira.[NAME] IN ('Result', 'ResultValue', 'Test') AND c.[STATUS] = 0 ) AS ti1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * ,CASE WHEN reference_group = 'HEALTH_FACILITY' THEN 'OrderingFacility' WHEN reference_group = 'LAB_FACILITY' THEN 'LabFacility' WHEN reference_group = 'LOINC' AND SUBGROUP <> 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SNOMED_LABTEST' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SPECIMEN_SOURCES' THEN 'SpecimenInfo' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY' THEN 'Susceptibility' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' THEN 'Susceptibility' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Susceptibility' END AS ReferenceQuestionType ,CASE WHEN reference_group = 'HEALTH_FACILITY' THEN 'Facility' WHEN reference_group = 'LAB_FACILITY' THEN 'Facility' WHEN reference_group = 'LOINC' THEN 'Test' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SNOMED_LABTEST' THEN 'Result' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'SPECIMEN_SOURCES' THEN 'SpecimenSource' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY' THEN 'Result' WHEN reference_group = 'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' THEN 'Method' WHEN SUBGROUP = 'LOINC_SENSITIVITY' THEN 'Test' END AS ReferenceQuestion FROM [IDS_REFERENCE_CODE] WHERE reference_group IN ( 'HEALTH_FACILITY' ,'LAB_FACILITY' ,'LOINC' ,'SNOMED' ,'SUSCEPTIBILITY' ,'SUSCEPTIBILITY_METHOD' ) ) AS trc ON ti1.Value = trc.REFERENCE_CODE AND ti1.Question = trc.ReferenceQuestion AND ti1.QuestionType = trc.ReferenceQuestionType ) AS t1t2 WHERE coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) IS NOT NULL AND CaseStatus NOT IN ('Batch Closed', 'Manually Closed') AND UNID IN ( SELECT c.[UNID] FROM [IDS_CASE] c LEFT JOIN [IDS_PRODUCT] p ON c.[PRODUCT_ID] = p.[UNID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_QUESTIONSET] qs ON c.[UNID] = qs.[CASE_ID] LEFT JOIN [IDS_ANSWER] a ON qs.[UNID] = a.[QUESTIONSET_ID] WHERE p.CODE IN ('AFM', 'ANTH' ,'ARB','BOT' ,'BOTFDB' ,'BOTI' ,'BOTWND' ,'BRU' ,'CAC' ,'CALI' ,'CHAGAS' ,'CHAGASCS' ,'CHAGASI' ,'CHOLERA' ,'CJD' ,'CYCLO' ,'DHF' ,'DIP' ,'ECOLI' ,'FBPOIS' ,'SCAB' ,'ENCNONARB' ,'EVD68','FLUD' ,'FLUH1N1' ,'HANTA' ,'HEPA' ,'CPOX','HFLU' ,'HUS' ,'JAM' ,'JAP' ,'LAC' ,'LEG' ,'LESH' ,'MAL' ,'MEAS' ,'MENB' ,'MERS' ,'MUMPS' ,'NMEN' ,'NORO','PERT' ,'PUM','PFGE','PLAG' ,'POL' ,'POW' ,'QF' ,'QFACUTE','RSV','EEE','STL','VEN','TSSS','RUB' ,'RUBCONG' ,'SARS' ,'SMPOX' ,'TUO','TET','TOXIN' ,'TUL' ,'TYPHOID' ,'VHF' ,'VISA' ,'VRSA' ,'WEE' ,'WNF' ,'WNI' ,'WNVU' ,'YER' ,'YF' ,'ZIKA' ) GROUP BY c.[UNID] HAVING ( MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[VALUE] else NULL End) = 'P' OR MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[VALUE] else NULL End) = 'R' OR MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] LIKE 'INVESTIGATION_STATUS%' then a.[VALUE] else NULL End) IS NULL ) AND MAX(case WHEN a.[QUESTION_ID] = 'MMWR_YEAR' then a.[VALUE] End) >= '18' ) group by UNID ,INVESTIG_UNID HAVING MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Result' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE (case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'ResultValue' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) End) NOT IN ('No growth' ,'Non Reactive' ,'Not detected' ,'not isolated' ,'Negative' ,'Below threshold level (qualifier value)' ,'Analyte not detected' ,'Unsatisfactory' ) AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'RUBV IgG%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'MeV IgG%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'MuV IgG%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HBV core Ab%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HBV DNA%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HBV e%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HBV surface%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'Hepatitis B%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HAV IgG%' AND MAX(case WHEN QuestionType = 'Test' AND Question = 'Test' then coalesce(DESCRIPTION, Value) ELSE NULL End) NOT LIKE 'HAV Ab Ser Ql%'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Update Official Count
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT c.unid FROM ids_case c WHERE c.external_id IN (100063033)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: VPD monitor cases (Area A)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: HepB untouched cases team A

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: VPD Cases Submitted for Review and Approval
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Cases Submitted for review: Reassign or indicate that review and approval has been completed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('DIP', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' AND a.VALUE IN (${CURRENT_USER_GROUPS}) AND a.iteration = ( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a1.unid FROM ids_answer a1, ids_questionset q WHERE a1.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a1.question_id = 'ASSIGN_REVIEW_STATUS_YES' AND a1.iteration = ( SELECT max(a2.iteration) FROM ids_answer a2 WHERE a2.questionset_id=q.unid AND a2.question_id = 'ASSIGNED_TO_GROUP' ) )

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: VPD Cases w/ Isolation Quarantine Orders Issued
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: VPD cases w/ isolation quarantine orders issued
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('DIP', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND ( ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='ISOLATED_YES' ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='ISOLATED_DATE_ENDED' AND a.date_value > $TODAY$ ) OR NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='ISOLATED_DATE_ENDED' ) ) OR ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='QUARANTINED_YES' ) AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='QUARANTINED_DATE_ENDED' AND a.date_value > $TODAY$ ) OR NOT EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id=q.unid AND q.case_id=cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='CLINICAL' AND a.question_id='QUARANTINED_DATE_ENDED' ) ))))

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: VPD Contact Events that have been Closed Within the Last 14 Days.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: VPD Contact Events that have been Closed Within the Last 14 Days.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.status IN (3,4) AND cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND product.CODE IN ('DIP', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') AND EXISTS ( SELECT a.unid FROM ids_answer a, ids_questionset q WHERE a.questionset_id= q.unid AND q.case_id = cs.unid AND q.questionset_id='ADMINISTRATIVE' AND a.question_id = 'DISEASE_STATUS_CONTACT' ) AND cs.modification_date >= $TODAY-14$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: VPD Inactive Events - Attention Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: VPD Inactive Events - Attention Required
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND product.CODE IN ('DIP', 'HEPB_A', 'HEPB_C', 'HEPB_P', 'MEAS', 'MUMPS', 'PERT', 'POL', 'RUB', 'RUBCONG', 'TET') AND cs.modification_date < $TODAY-10$

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: VPD Urgent Review Needed
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: VPD cases requiring urgent review.
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT product WHERE cs.PRODUCT_ID = product.UNID AND product.CODE IN ('FLU','FLUD','VAC','DIP','MEAS','MUMPS','PERT','POL','RUB','RUBCONG','TET') AND cs.TYPE < 10 AND cs.status IN (0,1,2,7,8) AND DATEDIFF(minute, cs.MODIFICATION_DATE, cs.CREATE_DATE) < 5

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Violet test - first specimen date
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: zz_Wes Test
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Output.COVID_19_PyGeocoder_Jur = 'Houston' AND Output.COVID_19_LabResult_PCR = 'PCR_Positive' AND Question.WCOV_QUALTRICS_SENT_YES_TIMESTAMP.Value != NULL AND Output.COVID_19_1st_PcrPos_SpecDate <= ${CURRENT_DATE} AND ComputeDate(Output.COVID_19_1st_PcrPos_SpecDate,10)>=${CURRENT_DATE}

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ZPR Open Female Age 15 to 45
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open ZPR events for female patients at age 15 to 45
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Party.Gender=1 AND (Question.AGE.Value>=15 AND Question.AGE.Value<=45)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ZPR Open Female Age 15 to 50 IgM+
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open ZPR cases with positive labs for female patients at age 15 to 50
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Party.Gender=1 AND (Question.AGE.Value>=15 AND Question.AGE.Value<=50) AND (Investigation.Test.Test='80824-6' OR Investigation.Test.Test='80618-2' OR Investigation.Test.Test='80619-0')
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ZPR Open Female Age 45 to 55
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open ZPR events for female patients at age 45 to 55
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Expression: Party.Gender=1 AND (Question.AGE.Value>=45 AND Question.AGE.Value<=55)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: ZPR Open Infants
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Open ZPR events for infants 2 years or younger
WorkflowQueryDefinition.BulkAction: Question.INVESTIGATION_STATUS= N; Task.Status = 2; Question.LAB_REVIEW_REQUIRED_LOCAL= NO; Case.Status =4;

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: COVID tasks

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Person Deduplication
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Person Deduplication
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM IDS_PARTY WHERE DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND TYPE=0 AND CATEGORY=0 order by TYPE,CATEGORY,REFERENCE_CATEGORY,LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, FULL_NAME

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Person Deduplication (address)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Person Address Deduplication
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM IDS_CONTACTPOINT WHERE DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND TYPE=0 AND CATEGORY=0

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication (COVID-19)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for General Surveillance Diseases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND pr.CODE LIKE '%wuhan%' AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication (CRE)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs JOIN IDS_PRODUCT p on cs.product_id = p.UNID WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND p.CODE='CRE' AND cs.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2018' AND NOT EXISTS (select part.unid FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.unid AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication (Foodborne)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for Foodborne Team
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND cs.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2018' AND (pr.CODE='AMEB' OR pr.CODE='BOTFDB' OR pr.CODE='BOTI' OR pr.CODE='BOT' OR pr.CODE='BOTWND' OR pr.CODE='BRU' OR pr.CODE='CAMP' OR pr.CODE='CJD' OR pr.CODE='CRYPT' OR pr.CODE='CYCLO' OR pr.CODE='CYSTI' OR pr.CODE='ECOLI' OR pr.CODE='CPERF' OR pr.CODE='FBOTHER' OR pr.CODE='STAPH' OR pr.CODE='FBPOIS' OR pr.CODE='GIAR' OR pr.CODE='HUS' OR pr.CODE='HGQ' OR pr.CODE='HGQL' OR pr.CODE='LIST' OR pr.CODE='NORO' OR pr.CODE='PFGE' OR pr.CODE='SAL' OR pr.CODE='SHIG' OR pr.CODE='TNIA' OR pr.CODE='TRICH' OR pr.CODE='VIBOTHER' OR pr.CODE='VIBPARA' OR pr.CODE='VIBVUL' OR pr.CODE='YER') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication (General Surveillance)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for General Surveillance Diseases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND cs.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2018' AND (pr.CODE='ANTH ' OR pr.CODE='EXPOSURE' OR pr.CODE='HFLU' OR pr.CODE='HANTA' OR pr.CODE='VHF' OR pr.CODE='HEPA' OR pr.CODE='FLU' OR pr.CODE='FLUH1N1' OR pr.CODE='FLUD' OR pr.CODE='SFLU' OR pr.CODE='LEG' OR pr.CODE='LESH' OR pr.CODE='LYME' OR pr.CODE='MENB' OR pr.CODE='MENF' OR pr.CODE='MENP' OR pr.CODE='MVIR' OR pr.CODE='NMEN' OR pr.CODE='PLAG' OR pr.CODE='PSTT' OR pr.CODE='SARS' OR pr.CODE='SCAB' OR pr.CODE='VRSA' OR pr.CODE='SAUR' OR pr.CODE='VISA' OR pr.CODE='STRA' OR pr.CODE='STRB' OR pr.CODE='STRP' OR pr.CODE='TRAN' OR pr.CODE='TUL' OR pr.CODE='ZIKA' ) AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication (Syphilis since 8/1/2018)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for Sexually Transmitted Infections
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND pr.CODE IN ('SYPHILIS' ,'PSYPH' ,'SSYPH' ,'ELSYPH' ,'USYPH' ,'LLSYPH' ,'LSYPH' ,'NSYPH' ,'CONGSYPH' ,'TRICH') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID) AND cs.create_date >='08/01/2018'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication (VPD)
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for VPD
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND cs.CREATE_DATE >= '01/01/2018' AND pr.PREFERRED_MODEL='VPDSurveillanceModel' AND pr.CODE NOT IN ('HEPB_C', 'HEPB_U') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - Area A
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication Area A
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT inv.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_INVESTIGATION inv, IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT invr, IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR attr WHERE cs.UNID=part.CASE_ID AND inv.PARTICIPANT_ID=part.UNID AND inv.UNID=invr.INVESTIGATION_ID AND invr.UNID=attr.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID AND attr.NAME='CLIA' AND attr.VALUE IN ('45D0489370' ,'45D0489821' ,'45D0490011' ,'45D0490893' ,'45D0491435' ,'45D0493939' ,'45D0494559' ,'45D0668777' ,'45D0710196' ,'45D0899528' ,'45D0936258' ,'45D1054348' ,'45D1099818' ,'45D2004217' ,'45D2004763' ,'45D2023783' ,'45D2042110' ,'45D0660081' ,'45D0660146' ,'45D0492541','45D0703562')) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT part.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.unid AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - Area B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication Area B
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT inv.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_INVESTIGATION inv, IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT invr, IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR attr WHERE cs.UNID=part.CASE_ID AND inv.PARTICIPANT_ID=part.UNID AND inv.UNID=invr.INVESTIGATION_ID AND invr.UNID=attr.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID AND attr.NAME='CLIA' AND attr.VALUE IN ('45D2042110','05D0643352','24D0400424','34D0655059','45D0660644','45D0697943','46D0523979','45D0502685','45D0505003','24D0404292','31D0938156','05D0713514')) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT part.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.unid AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - Area C
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication Area C
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND EXISTS (SELECT inv.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_INVESTIGATION inv, IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT invr, IDS_INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ATTR attr WHERE cs.UNID=part.CASE_ID AND inv.PARTICIPANT_ID=part.UNID AND inv.UNID=invr.INVESTIGATION_ID AND invr.UNID=attr.INVESTIGATION_RESULT_ID AND attr.NAME='CLIA' AND attr.VALUE IN ('45D0493380','45D0053108' ,'45D0490589' ,'45D0494884' ,'45D0495968' ,'45D0660248' ,'45D0669498' ,'45D0681848' ,'45D0701123')) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT part.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.unid AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - Chronic Hepatitis
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for Chronic Hepatitis
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND (pr.CODE='HEPB_C' OR pr.CODE='HEPB_U' OR pr.CODE='HEPC_C') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - Chronic and Zoonosis
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for ZVH Diseases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND (pr.CODE='HGE' OR pr.CODE='BABESIOSIS' OR pr.CODE='CHAGAS' OR pr.CODE='DENGUE' OR pr.CODE='HME' OR pr.CODE='EHR' OR pr.CODE='EEE' OR pr.CODE='LAC' OR pr.CODE='ARB' OR pr.CODE='STL' OR pr.CODE='VEN' OR pr.CODE='WNI' OR pr.CODE='WEE' OR pr.CODE='HEPB_A' OR pr.CODE='HEPB_P' OR pr.CODE='HEPB_U' OR pr.CODE='HEPC' OR pr.CODE='HEPE' OR pr.CODE='LYME' OR pr.CODE='MAL' OR pr.CODE='PLAG' OR pr.CODE='QF' OR pr.CODE='QFACUTE' OR pr.CODE='QFCHRONIC' OR pr.CODE='RAB_IN_REP' OR pr.CODE='RAB' OR pr.CODE='RMSF' OR pr.CODE='TUL' OR pr.CODE='TYPH' OR pr.CODE='TYPHUS' OR pr.CODE='WNF' OR pr.CODE='YF' OR pr.CODE='VHF' OR pr.CODE='WNVU') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - Foodborne
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for Foodborne Team
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND (pr.CODE='AMEB' OR pr.CODE='BOTFDB' OR pr.CODE='BOTI' OR pr.CODE='BOT' OR pr.CODE='BOTWND' OR pr.CODE='BRU' OR pr.CODE='CAMP' OR pr.CODE='CJD' OR pr.CODE='CRYPT' OR pr.CODE='CYCLO' OR pr.CODE='CYSTI' OR pr.CODE='ECOLI' OR pr.CODE='CPERF' OR pr.CODE='FBOTHER' OR pr.CODE='STAPH' OR pr.CODE='FBPOIS' OR pr.CODE='GIAR' OR pr.CODE='HUS' OR pr.CODE='HGQ' OR pr.CODE='HGQL' OR pr.CODE='LIST' OR pr.CODE='NORO' OR pr.CODE='PFGE' OR pr.CODE='SAL' OR pr.CODE='SHIG' OR pr.CODE='TNIA' OR pr.CODE='TRICH' OR pr.CODE='VIBOTHER' OR pr.CODE='VIBPARA' OR pr.CODE='VIBVUL' OR pr.CODE='YER') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - General Surveillance
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for General Surveillance Diseases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND (pr.CODE='ANTH ' OR pr.CODE='EXPOSURE' OR pr.CODE='HFLU' OR pr.CODE='HANTA' OR pr.CODE='VHF' OR pr.CODE='HEPA' OR pr.CODE='FLU' OR pr.CODE='FLUH1N1' OR pr.CODE='FLUD' OR pr.CODE='SFLU' OR pr.CODE='LEG' OR pr.CODE='LESH' OR pr.CODE='MENB' OR pr.CODE='MENF' OR pr.CODE='MENP' OR pr.CODE='MVIR' OR pr.CODE='NMEN' OR pr.CODE='PLAG' OR pr.CODE='PSTT' OR pr.CODE='SARS' OR pr.CODE='SCAB' OR pr.CODE='VRSA' OR pr.CODE='SAUR' OR pr.CODE='VISA' OR pr.CODE='STRA' OR pr.CODE='STRB' OR pr.CODE='STRP' OR pr.CODE='TRAN' OR pr.CODE='TUL') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - HIV
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for HIV
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND pr.CODE='HIV ' AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - STI since 8/1/2018
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for Sexually Transmitted Infections
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND (pr.CODE='SYPHILIS' OR pr.CODE='CHANCROID' OR pr.CODE='CHLAMYDIA' OR pr.CODE='GONOR' OR pr.CODE='GRANUL' OR pr.CODE='LGRANUL' OR pr.CODE='NGURETH' OR pr.CODE='PID' OR pr.CODE='PSYPH' OR pr.CODE='SSYPH' OR pr.CODE='ELSYPH' OR pr.CODE='USYPH' OR pr.CODE='LLSYPH' OR pr.CODE='LSYPH' OR pr.CODE='NSYPH' OR pr.CODE='CONGSYPH' OR pr.CODE='TRICH') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID) AND cs.create_date >='08/01/2018'

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Case Deduplication - VPD
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Case Deduplication for Vaccine Preventable Diseases
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT cs.UNID FROM IDS_CASE cs, IDS_PRODUCT pr WHERE cs.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND cs.PRODUCT_ID=pr.UNID AND (pr.CODE='DIP' OR pr.CODE='MUMPS' OR pr.CODE='PERT' OR pr.CODE='POL' OR pr.CODE='RUB' OR pr.CODE='RUBCONG' OR pr.CODE='MEAS' OR pr.CODE='SMPOX' OR pr.CODE='TET' OR pr.CODE='CPOX' OR pr.CODE='SHINGLES') AND NOT EXISTS (select party.UNID FROM IDS_PARTICIPANT part, IDS_PARTY party WHERE part.PARTY_ID=party.UNID AND party.DEDUP_STATUS = 0 AND part.CASE_ID=cs.UNID)

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Failed Actions
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Failed Actions
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM IDS_ACTION WHERE state = 2 order by CREATE_DATE

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Organization Deduplication
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Organization Deduplication
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM IDS_ORGANIZATION WHERE DEDUP_STATUS = 0

WorkflowQueryDefinition.Name: Failed Emails
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Description: Failed Emails
WorkflowQueryDefinition.Query: SELECT UNID FROM IDS_EMAIL_QUEUE WHERE status = 2 AND email_date IS NULL AND attempts > 0 order by UNID DESC
